[03] katha.m ^b^tathalakkha.na.m aagatoti tathaagato^eb^? pathaviidhaatuyaa kakkha.lalakkha.na.m, aapodhaatuyaa pagghara.nalakkha.na.m, tejodhaatuyaa u.nhattalakkha.na.m, vaayodhaatuyaa vitthambhanalakkha.na.m, aakaasadhaatuyaa asamphu.t.thalakkha.na.m, ruupassa ruppanalakkha.na.m, vedanaaya vedayitalakkha.na.m, sa~n~naaya sa~njaananalakkha.na.m, sa"nkhaaraana.m abhisa"nkhara.nalakkha.na.m, vi~n~naa.nassa vijaananalakkha.nanti ^a^M0.0114^ea^ eva.m pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m, dvaadasanna.m aayatanaana.m, a.t.thaarasanna.m dhaatuuna.m, baaviisatiyaa indriyaana.m, catunna.m saccaana.m, dvaadasapadikassa paccayaakaarassa, catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m, catunna.m sammappadhaanaana.m, catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m, pa~ncanna.m balaana.m, sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m, ariyassa a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa, sattanna.m visuddhiina.m, amatogadhassa nibbaanassaati eva.m tassa tassa dhammassa ya.m sabhaavasarasalakkha.na.m, ta.m tatha.m avitatha.m ana~n~natha.m lakkha.na.m ~naa.nagatiyaa aagato avirajjhitvaa patto adhigatoti tathaagato. eva.m tathalakkha.na.m aagatoti tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathadhamme yaathaavato abhisambuddhoti tathaagato^eb^? tathadhammaa naama cattaari ariyasaccaani. yathaaha ^a^P0.0130^ea^ -- ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, tathaani avitathaani ana~n~nathaani. katamaani cattaari? ida.m dukkhanti, bhikkhave, tathameta.m avitathameta.m ana~n~nathameta''nti (sa.m0 ni0 5.1090) vitthaaro. taani ca bhagavaa abhisambuddho, tasmaa tathaana.m abhisambuddhattaa tathaagato.

[03] apica jaraamara.nassa jaatipaccayasambhuutasamudaagata.t.tho tatho avitatho ana~n~natho...pe0... sa"nkhaaraana.m avijjaapaccayasambhuutasamudaagata.t.tho tatho avitatho ana~n~natho, tathaa avijjaaya sa"nkhaaraana.m paccaya.t.tho...pe0.. jaatiyaa jaraamara.nassa paccaya.t.tho tatho avitatho ana~n~natho, ta.m sabba.m bhagavaa abhisambuddho, tasmaapi tathaana.m abhisambuddhattaa tathaagato. abhisambuddhattho hi ettha gatasaddoti. eva.m tathadhamme yaathaavato abhisambuddhoti tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathadassitaaya tathaagato^eb^? ya.m sadevake...pe0... sadevamanussaaya pajaaya aparimaa.naasu lokadhaatuusu aparimaa.naana.m sattaana.m cakkhudvaare aapaathamaagacchanta.m ruupaaramma.na.m naama atthi, ta.m bhagavaa sabbaakaarato jaanaati passati. eva.m jaanataa passataa ca tena ta.m i.t.thaani.t.thaadivasena vaa di.t.thasutamutavi~n~naatesu labbhamaanakapadavasena vaa ``katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupaayatana.m ^a^V0.0103^ea^, ya.m ruupa.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya va.n.nanibhaa sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m niila.m piitaka''ntiaadinaa (dha0 sa0 616) nayena anekehi naamehi terasahi vaarehi dvipa~n~naasaaya nayehi vibhajjamaana.m tathameva hoti, vitatha.m natthi. esa nayo sotadvaaraadiisu aapaathamaagacchantesu saddaadiisu. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --

[02] ``ya.m ^a^M0.0115^ea^, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa...pe0... sadevamanussaaya di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anuvicarita.m manasaa, tamaha.m jaanaami, tamaha.m abbha~n~naasi.m, ta.m tathaagatassa vidita.m, ta.m tathaagato na upa.t.thaasii''ti (a0 ni0 4.24).
[03] eva.m tathadassitaaya tathaagato ^a^P0.0131^ea^. tattha tathadassiiatthe tathaagatoti padasambhavo veditabbo.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathavaaditaaya tathaagato^eb^? ya.m ratti.m bhagavaa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho, ya~nca ratti.m anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayi, etthantare pa~ncacattaaliisavassaparimaa.nakaala.m ya.m bhagavataa bhaasita.m lapita.m suttageyyaadi, sabba.m ta.m parisuddha.m paripu.n.na.m raagamadaadinimmathana.m ekasadisa.m tatha.m avitatha.m. tenaaha --

[02] ``ya~nca, cunda, ratti.m tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhati, ya~nca ratti.m anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayati, ya.m etasmi.m antare bhaasati lapati niddisati, sabba.m ta.m tatheva hoti, no a~n~nathaa, tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccatii''ti (dii0 ni0 3.188).
[03] gadaattho ettha gatasaddo. eva.m tathavaaditaaya tathaagato.
[03] apica aagadana.m aagado, vacananti attho. tatho avitatho avipariito aagado assaati dakaarassa takaara.m katvaa tathaagatoti evamettha padasiddhi veditabbaa.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathaakaaritaaya tathaagato^eb^? bhagavato hi vaacaaya kaayo anulometi, kaayassapi vaacaa, tasmaa yathaavaadii tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii ca hoti. eva.mbhuutassa cassa yathaavaacaa, kaayopi tathaa gato pavattoti attho. yathaa ca kaayo, vaacaapi tathaa gataa pavattaati tathaagato. tenaaha --

[02] ``yathaavaadii ^a^V0.0104^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagato tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii. iti yathaavaadii tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii. tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccatii''ti (a0 ni0 4.23).
[03] eva.m ^a^M0.0116^ea^ tathaakaaritaaya tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^b^abhibhavana.t.thena tathaagato^eb^? yasmaa upari bhavagga.m he.t.thaa aviici.m pariyanta.m karitvaa tiriya.m aparimaa.naasu lokadhaatuusu sabbasatte abhibhavati siilenapi samaadhinaapi pa~n~naayapi vimuttiyaapi vimutti~naa.nadassanenapi ^a^P0.0132^ea^, na tassa tulaa vaa pamaa.na.m vaa atthi, atha kho atulo appameyyo anuttaro devadevo sakkaana.m atisakko, brahmaana.m atibrahmaa sabbasattuttamo, tasmaa tathaagato. tenaaha --
[02] ``sadevake, bhikkhave, loke...pe0... sadevamanussaaya tathaagato abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavatti, tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccatii''ti (a0 ni0 4.23).

[03] tatraaya.m padasiddhi -- agado viya agado, desanaavilaaso ceva pu~n~nussayo ca. tena so mahaanubhaavo bhisakko viya dibbaagadena sappe sabbaparappavaadino sadevaka~nca loka.m abhibhavati. iti sabbalokaabhibhavane tatho avitatho avipariito yathaavuttova agado etassaati dakaarassa takaara.m katvaa tathaagatoti veditabbo. eva.m abhibhavana.t.thena tathaagato.

[03] apica tathaaya gatoti tathaagato, tatha.m gatoti tathaagato. tattha sakalaloka.m tiira.napari~n~naaya tathaaya gato avagatoti tathaagato. lokasamudaya.m pahaanapari~n~naaya tathaaya gato atiitoti tathaagato. lokanirodha.m sacchikiriyaaya tathaaya gato adhigatoti tathaagato. lokanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m tatha.m gato pa.tipannoti tathaagato. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --

[02] ``loko, bhikkhave, tathaagatena abhisambuddho, lokasmaa tathaagato visa.myutto. lokasamudayo, bhikkhave, tathaagatena abhisambuddho, lokasamudayo tathaagatassa pahiino, lokanirodho, bhikkhave, tathaagatena abhisambuddho, lokanirodho tathaagatassa sacchikato. lokanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ^a^V0.0105^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa ^a^P0.0133^ea^, lokanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa tathaagatassa bhaavitaa. ya.m, bhikkhave ^a^M0.0117^ea^, sadevakassa lokassa...pe0... sabba.m ta.m tathaagatena abhisambuddha.m. tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccatii''ti (a0 ni0 4.23).

[03] aparehipi a.t.thahi kaara.nehi bhagavaa tathaagato -- tathaaya aagatoti tathaagato, tathaaya gatoti tathaagato, tathaani aagatoti tathaagato, tathaa gatoti tathaagato, tathaavidhoti tathaagato, tathaa pavattitoti tathaagato, tathehi agatoti tathaagato, tathaa gatabhaavena tathaagato.
[03] katha.m ^b^tathaaya aagatoti tathaagato^eb^? yaa saa bhagavataa sumedhabhuutena diipa"nkaradasabalassa paadamuule --
[21] ``manussatta.m li"ngasampatti, hetu satthaaradassana.m,
[27] pabbajjaa gu.nasampatti, adhikaaro ca chandataa.
[22] a.t.thadhammasamodhaanaa, abhiniihaaro samijjhatii''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.59) --

[25] eva.m vutta.m a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m abhiniihaara.m sampaadentena ``aha.m sadevaka.m loka.m ti.n.no taaressaami, mutto mocessaami, danto damessaami, santo samessaami, assattho assaasessaami, parinibbuto parinibbaapessaami, buddho bodhessaamii''ti mahaapa.ti~n~naa pavattitaa. vutta~nheta.m --
[21] ``ki.m me ekena ti.n.nena, purisena thaamadassinaa.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m paapu.nitvaa, santaaressa.m sadevaka.m..
[21] ``iminaa me adhikaarena, katena purisuttame.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m paapu.nitvaa, taaremi janata.m bahu.m..
[21] ``sa.msaarasota.m chinditvaa, viddha.msetvaa tayo bhave.
[22] dhammanaava.m samaaruyha, santaaressa.m sadevaka.m..
[21] ``ki.m me a~n~naatavesena, dhamma.m sacchikatenidha.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m paapu.nitvaa, buddho hessa.m sadevake''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.55-58).

[03] ta.m ^a^V0.0106^ea^ paneta.m mahaapa.ti~n~na.m sakalassaapi buddhakaradhammasamudaayassa pavicaya paccavekkha.nasamaadaanaana.m kaara.nabhuuta.m ^a^P0.0134^ea^ avisa.mvaadetvaa lokanaayako yasmaa mahaakappaana.m satasahassaadhikaani cattaari asa"nkhyeyyaani sakkacca.m ^a^M0.0118^ea^ nirantara.m niravasesato daanapaaramiaadayo samati.msapaaramiyo puuretvaa, a"ngapariccaagaadayo pa~nca mahaapariccaage pariccajitvaa, saccaadhi.t.thaanaadiini cattaari adhi.t.thaanaani paribruuhetvaa, pu~n~na~naa.nasambhaare sambharitvaa, pubbayogapubbacariyadhammakkhaana~naatatthacariyaadayo ukka.msaapetvaa, buddhicariya.m paramako.ti.m paapetvaa, anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhi, tasmaa tasseva saa mahaapa.ti~n~naa tathaa avitathaa ana~n~nathaa, na tassa vaalaggamattampi vitatha.m atthi. tathaa hi diipa"nkaradasabalo ko.n.da~n~no ma"ngalo...pe0... kassapo bhagavaati ime catuviisati sammaasambuddhaa pa.tipaa.tiyaa uppannaa ``buddho bhavissatii''ti byaakari.msu. eva.m catuviisatiyaa buddhaana.m santike laddhabyaakara.no ye te kataabhiniihaarehi bodhisattehi laddhabbaa aanisa.msaa, te labhitvaava aagatoti taaya yathaavuttaaya mahaapa.ti~n~naaya tathaaya abhisambuddhabhaava.m aagato adhigatoti tathaagato. eva.m tathaaya aagatoti tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathaaya gatoti tathaagato^eb^? yaaya mahaakaru.naaya lokanaatho mahaadukkhasambaadhappa.tipanna.m sattanikaaya.m disvaa ``tassa nattha~n~no koci pa.tissara.na.m, ahameva namito sa.msaaradukkhato mutto mocessaamii''ti samussaahitamaanaso mahaabhiniihaaramakaasi. katvaa ca yathaapa.nidhaana.m sakalalokahitasampaadanaaya ussukkamaapanno attano kaayajiivitanirapekkho paresa.m sotapathaagamanamattenapi cittutraasasamuppaadikaa atidukkaraa dukkaracariyaa samaacaranto yathaa mahaabodhiyaa pa.tipatti haanabhaagiyaa sa.mkilesabhaagiyaa .thitibhaagiyaa vaa na hoti, atha kho uttaruttari visesabhaagiyaava hoti, tathaa pa.tipajjamaano anupubbena niravasese bodhisambhaare sampaadetvaa abhisambodhi.m paapu.ni. tato para~nca taayeva mahaakaru.naaya sa~ncoditamaanaso pavivekarati.m parama~nca santa.m vimokkhasukha.m pahaaya baalajanabahule loke tehi samuppaadita.m sammaanaavamaanavippakaara.m aga.netvaa vineyyajanassa vinayanena niravasesa.m buddhakicca.m ^a^P0.0135^ea^ ni.t.thapesi. tattha yo bhagavato sattesu mahaakaru.naaya samokkamanaakaaro, so parato aavibhavissati. yathaa ca buddhabhuutassa ^a^M0.0119^ea^ lokanaathassa sattesu mahaakaru.naa, eva.m bodhisattabhuutassapi mahaabhiniihaarakaalaadiisuuti sabbattha sabbadaa ca ekasadisataaya tathaa avitathaa ana~n~nathaa, tasmaa tiisupi avatthaasu sabbasattesu samaanarasaaya tathaaya mahaakaru.naaya sakalalokahitaaya gato pa.tipannoti tathaagato. eva.m tathaaya gatoti tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathaani aagatoti tathaagato^eb^? tathaani naama cattaari ariyamagga~naa.naani. taani hi ^a^V0.0107^ea^ ida.m dukkha.m, aya.m dukkhasamudayo, aya.m dukkhanirodho, aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati eva.m sabba~neyyadhammasa"ngaahakaana.m pavattinivattitadubhayahetubhuutaana.m catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m dukkhassa pii.lana.t.tho sa"nkhata.t.tho santaapa.t.tho vipari.naama.t.tho, samudayassa aayuuhana.t.tho nidaana.t.tho sa.myoga.t.tho palibodha.t.tho, nirodhassa nissara.na.t.tho viveka.t.tho asa"nkhata.t.tho amata.t.tho, maggassa niyyaana.t.tho hetva.t.tho dassana.t.tho aadhipateyya.t.thotiaadiina.m tabbibhaagaana~nca yathaabhuutasabhaavaavabodhavibandhakassa sa.mkilesapakkhassa samucchindanena pa.tiladdhaaya tattha asammohaabhisamayasa"nkhaataaya avipariitaakaarappavattiyaa dhammaana.m sabhaavasarasalakkha.nassa avisa.mvaadanato tathaani avitathaani ana~n~nathaani, taani bhagavaa ana~n~naneyyo sayameva aagato adhigato, tasmaa tathaani aagatoti tathaagato.

[03] yathaa ca magga~naa.naani, eva.m bhagavato tiisu kaalesu appa.tihata~naa.naani catupa.tisambhidaa~naa.naani catuvesaarajja~naa.naani pa~ncagatipariccheda~naa.naani chaasaadhaara.na~naa.naani sattabojjha"ngavibhaavana~naa.naani a.t.thamagga"ngavibhaavana~naa.naani navaanupubbavihaarasamaapatti~naa.naani dasabala~naa.naani ca tathabhaave veditabbaani.

[03] tatraaya.m vibhaavanaa -- ya~nhi ki~nci aparimaa.naasu lokadhaatuusu aparimaa.naana.m sattaana.m hiinaadibhedabhinnaasu atiitaasu khandhaayatanadhaatuusu sabhaavakiccaadi ^a^P0.0136^ea^ avatthaavisesaadi khandhappa.tibaddhanaamagottaadi ca jaanitabba.m. anindriyabaddhesu ca atisukhumatirohitaviduuradesesupi ruupadhammesu yo ta.mta.mpaccayavisesehi saddhi.m paccayuppannaana.m va.n.nasa.n.thaanagandharasaphassaadiviseso, tattha sabbattheva hatthatale .thapitaaamalake viya ^a^M0.0120^ea^ paccakkhato appa.tihata.m bhagavato ~naa.na.m pavattati, tathaa anaagataasu paccuppannaasu caati imaani tiisu kaalesu appa.tihata~naa.naani naama. yathaaha --

[02] ``atiita.mse buddhassa bhagavato appa.tihata.m ~naa.na.m, anaagata.mse buddhassa bhagavato appa.tihata.m ~naa.na.m, paccuppanna.mse buddhassa bhagavato appa.tihata.m ~naa.na''nti (pa.ti0 ma0 3.5).

[03] taani panetaani tattha tattha dhammaana.m sabhaavasarasalakkha.nassa avisa.mvaadanato tathaani avitathaani ana~n~nathaani, taani bhagavaa sayambhuu~naa.nena adhiga~nchiiti. evampi tathaani aagatoti tathaagato.

[03] tathaa ^a^V0.0108^ea^ atthappa.tisambhidaa dhammappa.tisambhidaa niruttippa.tisambhidaa pa.tibhaanappa.tisambhidaati catasso pa.tisambhidaa. tattha atthappabhedassa sallakkha.navibhaavanavavatthaanakara.nasamattha.m atthappabhedagata.m ~naa.na.m atthappa.tisambhidaa. dhammappabhedassa sallakkha.navibhaavanavavatthaanakara.nasamattha.m dhammappabhedagata.m ~naa.na.m dhammappa.tisambhidaa. niruttippabhedassa sallakkha.navibhaavanavavatthaanakara.nasamattha.m niruttaabhilaape pabhedagata.m ~naa.na.m niruttippa.tisambhidaa. pa.tibhaanappabhedassa sallakkha.navibhaavanavavatthaanakara.nasamattha.m pa.tibhaanappabhedagata.m ~naa.na.m pa.tibhaanappa.tisambhidaa. vutta~nheta.m --

[02] ``atthe ~naa.na.m atthappa.tisambhidaa, dhamme ~naa.na.m dhammappa.tisambhidaa, tatra dhammaniruttaabhilaape ~naa.na.m niruttippa.tisambhidaa, ~naa.nesu ~naa.na.m pa.tibhaanappa.tisambhidaa''ti (vibha0 718-721).

[03] ettha ca hetuanusaarena ara.niiyato adhigantabbato ca sa"nkhepato hetuphala.m attho naama. pabhedato pana ya.m ki~nci paccayuppanna.m, nibbaana.m ^a^P0.0137^ea^, bhaasitattho, vipaako, kiriyaati ime pa~nca dhammaa attho. ta.m attha.m paccavekkhantassa tasmi.m atthe pabhedagata.m ~naa.na.m atthappa.tisambhidaa. dhammoti sa"nkhepato paccayo. so hi yasmaa ta.m ta.m attha.m vidahati pavatteti ceva paapeti ca, tasmaa dhammoti vuccati, pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattanako hetu ariyamaggo bhaasita.m kusala.m akusalanti ime pa~nca dhammaa dhammo, ta.m dhamma.m paccavekkhantassa tasmi.m dhamme pabhedagata.m ~naa.na.m dhammappa.tisambhidaa. vuttampi ceta.m --

[02] ``dukkhe ^a^M0.0121^ea^ ~naa.na.m atthappa.tisambhidaa, dukkhasamudaye ~naa.na.m dhammappa.tisambhidaa, dukkhanirodhe ~naa.na.m atthappa.tisambhidaa, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ~naa.na.m dhammappa.tisambhidaa''ti (vibha0 719).

[03] atha vaa hetumhi ~naa.na.m dhammappa.tisambhidaa, hetuphale ~naa.na.m atthappa.tisambhidaa. ye dhammaa jaataa bhuutaa sa~njaataa nibbattaa abhinibbattaa paatubhuutaa, imesu dhammesu ~naa.na.m atthappa.tisambhidaa. yamhaa dhammaa te dhammaa jaataa bhuutaa sa~njaataa nibbattaa abhinibbattaa paatubhuutaa, tesu dhammesu ~naa.na.m dhammappa.tisambhidaa. jaraamara.ne ~naa.na.m atthappa.tisambhidaa, jaraamara.nasamudaye ~naa.na.m dhammappa.tisambhidaa. jaraamara.nanirodhe ~naa.na.m atthappa.tisambhidaa, jaraamara.nanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ~naa.na.m dhammappa.tisambhidaa. jaatiyaa, bhave, upaadaane, ta.nhaaya, vedanaaya, phasse, sa.laayatane, naamaruupe, vi~n~naa.ne, sa"nkhaaresu ~naa.na.m atthappa.tisambhidaa, sa"nkhaarasamudaye ^a^V0.0109^ea^ ~naa.na.m dhammappa.tisambhidaa. sa"nkhaaranirodhe ~naa.na.m atthappa.tisambhidaa, sa"nkhaaranirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ~naa.na.m dhammappa.tisambhidaa.

[02] ``idha bhikkhu dhamma.m jaanaati sutta.m geyya.m...pe0... vedalla.m, aya.m vuccati dhammappa.tisambhidaa. so tassa tasseva bhaasitassa attha.m jaanaati `aya.m imassa bhaasitassa attho, aya.m imassa ^a^P0.0138^ea^ bhaasitassa attho'ti, aya.m vuccati atthappa.tisambhidaa.

[02] ``katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye kaamaavacara.m kusala.m citta.m uppanna.m hoti somanassasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m ruupaaramma.na.m vaa...pe0... dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa. imesu dhammesu ~naa.na.m dhammappa.tisambhidaa, tesa.m vipaake ~naa.na.m atthappa.tisambhidaa''tiaadi (vibha0 724-725) vitthaaro.

[03] yaa panetasmi.m atthe ca dhamme ca sabhaavanirutti abyabhicaaravohaaro abhilaapo, tasmi.m sabhaavaniruttaabhilaape maagadhikaaya sabbasattaana.m muulabhaasaaya ``aya.m sabhaavanirutti, aya.m asabhaavaniruttii''ti pabhedagata.m ~naa.na.m niruttippa.tisambhidaa. yathaavuttesu tesu ~naa.nesu gocarakiccato vitthaarato pavatta.m sabbampi ta.m ~naa.na.m aaramma.na.m katvaa paccavekkhantassa tasmi.m ~naa.ne pabhedagata.m ~naa.na.m pa.tibhaanappa.tisambhidaa. iti imaani cattaari ^a^M0.0122^ea^ pa.tisambhidaa~naa.naani sayameva bhagavataa adhigataani atthadhammaadike tasmi.m tasmi.m attano visaye avisa.mvaadanavasena avipariitaakaarappavattiyaa tathaani avitathaani ana~n~nathaani. evampi bhagavaa tathaani aagatoti tathaagato.

[03] tathaa ya.mki~nci ~neyya.m naama, sabba.m ta.m bhagavataa sabbaakaarena ~naata.m di.t.tha.m adhigata.m abhisambuddha.m. tathaa hissa abhi~n~neyyaa dhammaa abhi~n~neyyato buddhaa, pari~n~neyyaa dhammaa pari~n~neyyato, pahaatabbaa dhammaa pahaatabbato, sacchikaatabbaa dhammaa sacchikaatabbato, bhaavetabbaa dhammaa bhaavetabbato, yato na.m koci sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa ``ime naama te dhammaa anabhisambuddhaa''ti saha dhammena anuyu~njitu.m samattho natthi.

[03] ya.mki~nci pahaatabba.m naama, sabba.m ta.m bhagavato anavasesato bodhimuuleyeva pahiina.m anuppattidhamma.m ^a^V0.0110^ea^, na tassa pahaanaaya uttari kara.niiya.m atthi. tathaa hissa lobhadosamohavipariitamanasikaaraahirikaanottappathinamiddhakodhuupanaaha- makkhapalaasaissaamacchariyamaayaasaa.theyyathambhasaarambhamaanaatimaanamadappamaadatividhaa- kusalamuuladuccaritavisamavipariitasa~n~naa- ^a^P0.0139^ea^ malavitakkapapa~ncaesanaata.nhaacatubbidhavipariyesaaasavagantha- oghayogaagatita.nhupaadaanapa~ncaabhinandananiivara.nacetokhilacetasovinibandha- chavivaadamuulasattaanusayaa.t.thamicchattanavaaaghaatavatthuta.nhaa- muulakadasaakusalakammapathaekaviisati anesanadvaasa.t.thidi.t.thigataa.t.thasatata.nhaavicaritaadippabheda.m diya.d.dhakilesasahassa.m saha vaasanaaya pahiina.m samucchinna.m samuuhata.m, yato na.m koci sama.no vaa...pe0... brahmaa vaa ``ime naama te kilesaa appahiinaa''ti saha dhammena anuyu~njitu.m samattho natthi.

[03] ye cime bhagavataa kammavipaakakilesuupavaadaaa.naaviitikkamappabhedaa antaraayikaa vuttaa, alameva te pa.tisevato ekantena antaraayaaya. yato na.m koci sama.no vaa...pe0... brahmaa vaa ``naala.m te pa.tisevato antaraayaayaa''ti saha dhammena anuyu~njitu.m samattho natthi.

[03] yo ca bhagavataa niravasesava.t.tadukkhanissara.naaya siilasamaadhipa~n~naaya sa"ngaho sattako.t.thaasiko sattati.msappabhedo ariyamaggapubba"ngamo anuttaro ^a^M0.0123^ea^ niyyaaniko dhammo desito, so ekanteneva niyyaati, pa.tipannassa va.t.tadukkhato mokkhaaya hoti, yato na.m koci sama.no vaa...pe0... brahmaa vaa ``niyyaaniko dhammoti tayaa desito na niyyaatii''ti saha dhammena anuyu~njitu.m samattho natthiiti. vutta~nheta.m -- ``sammaasambuddhassa te pa.tijaanato ime dhammaa anabhisambuddhaa''ti (ma0 ni0 1.150) vitthaaro. evametaani attano ~naa.nappahaanadesanaavisesaana.m avitathabhaavaavabodhanato ^a^P0.0140^ea^ avipariitaakaarappavattitaani bhagavato catuvesaarajja~naa.naani tathaani avitathaani ana~n~nathaani. evampi bhagavaa tathaani aagatoti tathaagato.

[03] tathaa nirayagati, tiracchaanagati, petagati, manussagati, devagatiiti pa~nca gatiyo, taasu sa~njiivaadayo a.t.tha mahaanirayaa, kukku.laadayo so.lasa ussadanirayaa, lokantarikanirayoti sabbepime ekantadukkhataaya nirassaada.t.thena nirayaa, yathaakammunaa gantabbato gati caati ^b^nirayagati,^eb^ tibbandhakaarasiitanarakaapi etesveva antogadhaa. kimikii.tasariisapapakkhiso.nasi"ngaalaadayo tiriya.m a~nchitabhaavena tiracchaanaa, te eva gatiiti ^b^tiracchaanagati^eb^. khuppipaasitattaa paradattuupajiivinijjhaamata.nhikaadayo dukkhabahulataaya paaka.tasukhato ^a^V0.0111^ea^ itaa vigataati petaa, te eva gatiiti ^b^petagati,^eb^ kaalaka~ncikaadiasuraapi etesvevantogadhaa. parittadiipavaasiihi saddhi.m jambudiipaadicatumahaadiipavaasino manaso ussannataaya manussaa, te eva gatiiti ^b^manussagati^eb^. caatumahaaraajikato pa.t.thaaya yaava nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupagaati ime chabbiisati devanikaayaa dibbanti attano iddhaanubhaavena kii.lanti jotanti caati devaa, te eva gatiiti ^b^devagati^eb^.

[03] taa panetaa gatiyo yasmaa ta.mta.mkammanibbatto upapattibhavaviseso, tasmaa atthato vipaakakkhandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m. tattha ``aya.m naama gati iminaa naama kammunaa jaayati, tassa ca kammassa paccayavisesehi eva.m vibhaagabhinnattaa visu.m ete sattanikaayaa eva.m vibhaagabhinnaa''ti yathaasaka.m hetuphalavibhaagaparicchindanavasena .thaanaso hetuso bhagavato ~naa.na.m pavattati. tenaaha bhagavaa --

[02] ``pa~nca ^a^M0.0124^ea^ kho imaa, saariputta, gatiyo. katamaa pa~nca? nirayo, tiracchaanayoni, pettivisayo, manussaa, devaa. niraya~ncaaha.m, saariputta, pajaanaami nirayagaami~nca magga.m nirayagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m, yathaa pa.tipanno ca kaayassa bhedaa ^a^P0.0141^ea^ parammara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, ta~nca pajaanaamii''tiaadi (ma0 ni0 1.153).
[03] taani panetaani bhagavato ~naa.naani tasmi.m tasmi.m visaye avipariitaakaarappavattiyaa avisa.mvaadanato tathaani avitathaani ana~n~nathaani. evampi bhagavaa tathaani aagatoti tathaagato.

[03] tathaa ya.m sattaana.m saddhaadiyogavikalaavikalabhaavaavabodhanena apparajakkhamahaarajakkhataadivisesavibhaavana.m pa~n~naasaaya aakaarehi pavatta.m bhagavato indriyaparopariyatta~naa.na.m. vutta~nheta.m -- ``saddho puggalo apparajakkho, assaddho puggalo mahaarajakkho''ti (pa.ti0 ma0 1.111) vitthaaro.

[03] ya~nca ``aya.m puggalo apparajakkho, aya.m sassatadi.t.thiko, aya.m ucchedadi.t.thiko, aya.m anulomikaaya.m khantiya.m .thito, aya.m yathaabhuuta~naa.ne .thito, aya.m kaamaasayo, na nekkhammaadiaasayo, aya.m nekkhammaasayo, na kaamaadiaasayo''tiaadinaa ``imassa kaamaraago ativiya ^a^V0.0112^ea^ thaamagato, na pa.tighaadiko, imassa pa.tigho ativiya thaamagato, na kaamaraagaadiko''tiaadinaa ``imassa pu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro adhiko, na apu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro na aane~njaabhisa"nkhaaro, imassa apu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro adhiko, na pu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro na aane~njaabhisa"nkhaaro, imassa aane~njaabhisa"nkhaaro adhiko, na pu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro na apu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro. imassa kaayasucarita.m adhika.m, imassa vaciisucarita.m, imassa manosucarita.m, aya.m hiinaadhimuttiko, aya.m pa.niitaadhimuttiko, aya.m kammaavara.nena samannaagato, aya.m kilesaavara.nena samannaagato, aya.m vipaakaavara.nena samannaagato, aya.m na kammaavara.nena samannaagato, na kilesaavara.nena samannaagato, na vipaakaavara.nena samannaagato''tiaadinaa ca sattaana.m aasayaadiina.m yathaabhuuta.m vibhaavanaakaarappavatta.m bhagavato aasayaanusaya~naa.na.m. ya.m sandhaaya vutta.m --
[02] ``idha ^a^M0.0125^ea^ tathaagato sattaana.m aasaya.m jaanaati, anusaya.m jaanaati, carita.m jaanaati, adhimutti.m jaanaati, bhabbaabhabbe satte jaanaatii''tiaadi (pa.ti0 ma0 1.113).

[03] ya~nca uparimahe.t.thimapurimapacchimakaayehi dakkhi.navaamaakkhika.n.nasotanaasikasotaa.msakuu.tahatthapaadehi a"ngulia"ngulantarehi lomakuupehi ca aggikkhandhuudakadhaaraapavattana.m ana~n~nasaadhaara.na.m vividhavikubbaniddhinimmaapanaka.m ^a^P0.0142^ea^ bhagavato yamakapaa.tihaariya~naa.na.m. ya.m sandhaaya vutta.m --

[02] ``idha tathaagato yamakapaa.tihaariya.m karoti asaadhaara.na.m saavakehi, uparimakaayato aggikkhandho pavattati, he.t.thimakaayato udakadhaaraa pavattati. he.t.thimakaayato aggikkhandho pavattati, uparimakaayato udakadhaaraa pavattatii''tiaadi (pa.ti0 ma0 1.116).

[03] ya~nca raagaadiihi jaatiaadiihi ca anekehi dukkhadhammehi upadduta.m sattanikaaya.m tato niiharitukaamataavasena naanaanayehi pavattassa bhagavato mahaakaru.nokkamanassa paccayabhuuta.m mahaakaru.naasamaapatti~naa.na.m. yathaaha (pa.ti0 ma0 1.117-118) --

[02] ``katama.m tathaagatassa mahaakaru.naasamaapattiyaa ~naa.na.m? bahukehi aakaarehi passantaana.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m sattesu mahaakaru.naa okkamati, aaditto lokasannivaasoti passantaana.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m sattesu mahaakaru.naa okkamati. uyyutto, payaato, kummaggappa.tipanno, upaniiyati loko addhuvo, ataa.no loko anabhissaro ^a^V0.0113^ea^, assako loko, sabba.m pahaaya gamaniiya.m, uuno loko atitto ta.nhaadaasoti passantaana.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m sattesu mahaakaru.naa okkamati.

[02] ``ataayano lokasannivaaso, ale.no, asara.no, asara.niibhuuto. uddhato loko avuupasanto, sasallo lokasannivaaso viddho puthusallehi, avijjandhakaaraavara.no ^a^M0.0126^ea^ kilesapa~njarapakkhitto, avijjaagato lokasannivaaso a.n.dabhuuto pariyonaddho tantaakulakajaato kulagu.n.dikajaato mu~njapabbajabhuuto apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m sa.msaara.m naativattati, avijjaavisadosasa.mlitto, kilesakalaliibhuuto, raagadosamohaja.taaja.tito.

[02] ``ta.nhaasa"nghaa.tapa.timukko, ta.nhaajaalena ottha.to, ta.nhaasotena vuyhati, ta.nhaasa~n~nojanena sa.myutto, ta.nhaanusayena ^a^P0.0143^ea^ anusa.to, ta.nhaasantaapena santappati, ta.nhaapari.laahena pari.dayhati.

[02] ``di.t.thisa"nghaa.tapa.timukko, di.t.thijaalena ottha.to, di.t.thisotena vuyhati, di.t.thisa~n~nojanena sa.myutto, di.t.thaanusayena anusa.to, di.t.thisantaapena santappati, di.t.thipari.laahena pari.dayhati.
[02] ``jaatiyaa anugato, jaraaya anusa.to, byaadhinaa abhibhuuto, mara.nena abbhaahato, dukkhe pati.t.thito.

[02] ``ta.nhaaya u.d.dito, jaraapaakaaraparikkhitto, maccupaasena parikkhitto, mahaabandhanabaddho, raagabandhanena dosamohamaanadi.t.thikilesaduccaritabandhanena baddho, mahaasambaadhappa.tipanno, mahaapalibodhena palibuddho, mahaapapaate patito, mahaakantaarappa.tipanno, mahaasa.msaarappa.tipanno, mahaavidugge samparivattati, mahaapalipe palipanno.

[02] ``abbhaahato lokasannivaaso, aaditto lokasannivaaso raagagginaa dosagginaa mohagginaa jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, unniitako lokasannivaaso ha~n~nati niccamataa.no pattada.n.do takkaro, vajjabandhanabaddho ^a^V0.0114^ea^ aaghaatanapaccupa.t.thito, anaatho lokasannivaaso paramakaaru~n~nappatto, dukkhaabhitunno ciraratta.m pii.lito, gadhito nicca.m pipaasito.
[02] ``andho ^a^M0.0127^ea^ acakkhuko, hatanetto apari.naayako, vipathapakkhando a~njasaaparaddho, mahoghapakkhando.

[02] ``dviihi di.t.thigatehi pariyu.t.thito, tiihi duccaritehi vippa.tipanno, catuuhi yogehi yojito, catuuhi ganthehi ganthito, catuuhi upaadaanehi upaadiyati, pa~ncagatisamaaru.lho, pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi rajjati, pa~ncahi niivara.nehi ottha.to, chahi ^a^P0.0144^ea^ vivaadamuulehi vivadati, chahi ta.nhaakaayehi rajjati, chahi di.t.thigatehi pariyu.t.thito, sattahi anusayehi anusa.to, sattahi sa~n~nojanehi sa.myutto, sattahi maanehi unnato, a.t.thahi lokadhammehi samparivattati, a.t.thahi micchattehi niyyaato, a.t.thahi purisadosehi dussati, navahi aaghaatavatthuuhi aaghaatito, navavidhamaanehi unnato, navahi ta.nhaamuulakehi dhammehi rajjati, dasahi kilesavatthuuhi kilissati, dasahi aaghaatavatthuuhi aaghaatito, dasahi akusalakammapathehi samannaagato, dasahi sa.myojanehi sa.myutto, dasahi micchattehi niyyaato, dasavatthukaaya micchaadi.t.thiyaa samannaagato, dasavatthukaaya antaggaahikaaya di.t.thiyaa samannaagato, a.t.thasatata.nhaapapa~ncehi papa~ncito, dvaasa.t.thiyaa di.t.thigatehi pariyu.t.thito, lokasannivaasoti passantaana.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m sattesu mahaakaru.naa okkamati.

[02] ``aha~ncamhi ti.n.no, loko ca ati.n.no. aha~ncamhi mutto, loko ca amutto. aha~ncamhi danto, loko ca adanto. aha~ncamhi santo, loko ca asanto. aha~ncamhi assattho, loko ca anassattho. aha~ncamhi parinibbuto, loko ca aparinibbuto. pahomi khvaaha.m ti.n.no taaretu.m, mutto mocetu.m, danto dametu.m, santo sametu.m, assattho assaasetu.m, parinibbuto parinibbaapetunti passantaana.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m sattesu mahaakaru.naa okkamatii''ti (pa.ti0 ma0 1.117-118).
[03] eva.m ^a^M0.0128^ea^ ekuunanavutiyaa aakaarehi vibhajana.m kata.m.

[03] ya.m pana yaavataa dhammadhaatuyaa yattaka.m ~naatabba.m sa"nkhataasa"nkhataadikassa sabbassa paropadesanirapekkha.m ^a^V0.0115^ea^ sabbaakaarena pa.tivijjhanasamattha.m aaka"nkhamattappa.tibaddhavuttiana~n~nasaadhaara.na.m bhagavato ~naa.na.m sabbathaa anavasesasa"nkhataasa"nkhatasammutisaccaavabodhato sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.na.m tatthaavara.naabhaavato nissa"ngappavattimupaadaaya anaavara.na~naa.nanti vuccati. ekameva hi ta.m ~naa.na.m visayappavattimukhena a~n~nehi asaadhaara.nabhaavadassanattha.m ^a^P0.0145^ea^ duvidhena uddi.t.tha.m. a~n~nathaa sabba~n~nutaanaavara.na~naa.naana.m saadhaara.nataa sabbavisayataa aapajjeyyu.m, na ca ta.m yutta.m ki~ncaapi imaaya yuttiyaa. aya~nhettha paa.li --

[02] ``sabba.m sa"nkhatamasa"nkhata.m anavasesa.m jaanaatiiti sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.na.m, tattha aavara.na.m natthiiti anaavara.na~naa.na.m. atiita.m sabba.m jaanaatiiti sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.na.m, tattha aavara.na.m natthiiti anaavara.na~naa.na.m. anaagata.m sabba.m jaanaatiiti sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.na.m, tattha aavara.na.m natthiiti anaavara.na~naa.na.m. paccuppanna.m sabba.m jaanaatiiti sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.na.m, tattha aavara.na.m natthiiti anaavara.na~naa.na''nti (pa.ti0 ma0 1.119-120) vitthaaro.

[03] evametaani bhagavato chaasaadhaara.na~naa.naani avipariitaakaarappavattiyaa yathaasakavisayassa avisa.mvaadanato tathaani avitathaani ana~n~nathaani. evampi bhagavaa tathaani aagatoti tathaagato.
[03] tathaa --

[03] ``sattime, bhikkhave, bojjha"ngaa -- satisambojjha"ngo, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo, viiriyasambojjha"ngo, piitisambojjha"ngo, passaddhisambojjha"ngo, samaadhisambojjha"ngo, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo''ti (pa.ti0 ma0 2.17; sa.m0 ni0 5.185) eva.m ^b^saruupato,^eb^ ``yaaya.m lokuttaramaggakkha.ne uppajjamaanaa liinuddhaccapati.t.thaanaayuuhanakaamasukhallikattakilamathaanuyogaucchedasassataabhinivesaadiina.m anekesa.m upaddavaana.m pa.tipakkhabhuutaa satiaadibhedaa dhammasaamaggii, yaaya ariyasaavako bujjhati kilesaniddaaya u.t.thahati, cattaari vaa ariyasaccaani pa.tivijjhati, nibbaanameva vaa sacchikarotiiti, saa dhammasaamaggii bodhiiti vuccati. tassaa `bodhiyaa a"ngaati bojjha"ngaa, ariyasaavako vaa yathaavuttaaya dhammasaamaggiyaa bujjhatiiti ^a^M0.0129^ea^ katvaa bodhiiti vuccati, tassa bodhissa a"ngaatipi bojjha"ngaa''ti eva.m ^b^saama~n~nalakkha.nato^eb^. ``upa.t.thaanalakkha.no satisambojjha"ngo, pavicayalakkha.no dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo, paggahalakkha.no viiriyasambojjha"ngo, phara.nalakkha.no piitisambojjha"ngo, upasamalakkha.no ^a^V0.0116^ea^ passaddhisambojjha"ngo, avikkhepalakkha.no samaadhisambojjha"ngo, pa.tisa"nkhaanalakkha.no upekkhaasambojjha"ngo''ti eva.m ^b^visesalakkha.nato^eb^.

[03] ``tattha katamo satisambojjha"ngo? idha, bhikkhu ^a^P0.0146^ea^, satimaa hoti paramena satinepakkena samannaagato, cirakatampi cirabhaasitampi saritaa hoti anussaritaa''tiaadinaa (vibha0 467) sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m a~n~nama~n~nopakaaravasena ^b^ekakkha.ne pavattidassanato,^eb^ ``tattha katamo satisambojjha"ngo? atthi ajjhatta.m, bhikkhave, dhammesu sati, atthi bahiddhaa dhammesu satii''tiaadinaa tesa.m ^b^visayavibhaagena pavattidassanato^eb^. ``tattha katamo satisambojjha"ngo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami''ntiaadinaa (vibha0 471) ^b^bhaavanaavidhidassanato^eb^. ``tattha katame satta bojjha"ngaa? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti...pe0... tasmi.m samaye satta bojjha"ngaa honti satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo. tattha katamo satisambojjha"ngo? yaa sati...pe0... anussatii''tiaadinaa (vibha0 478-479) ^b^channavutiyaa nayasahassavibhaagehii^eb^ti eva.m naanaakaarato pavattaani bhagavato sambojjha"ngavibhaavana~naa.naani tassa tassa atthassa avisa.mvaadanato tathaani avitathaani ana~n~nathaani. evampi bhagavaa tathaani aagatoti tathaagato.
[03] tathaa --

[03] ``tattha katama.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. seyyathida.m, sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhii''ti (vibha0 205) eva.m ^b^saruupato^eb^. sabbakilesehi aarakattaa ariyabhaavakarattaa ariyaphalappa.tilaabhakarattaa ca ariyo, a.t.thavidhattaa nibbaanaadhigamaaya ekantakaara.nattaa ca a.t.tha"ngiko. kilese maarento gacchati, nibbaanatthikehi maggiiyati, saya.m vaa nibbaana.m maggatiiti maggoti eva.m ^b^saama~n~nalakkha.nato^eb^. ``sammaa dassanalakkha.naa sammaadi.t.thi, sammaa abhiniropanalakkha.no sammaasa"nkappo, sammaa pariggaha.nalakkha.naa sammaavaacaa, sammaa samu.t.thaanalakkha.no ^a^M0.0130^ea^ sammaakammanto, sammaa vodaanalakkha.no sammaaaajiivo, sammaa paggahalakkha.no sammaavaayaamo, sammaa upa.t.thaanalakkha.naa sammaasati, sammaa avikkhepalakkha.no sammaasamaadhii''ti eva.m ^b^visesalakkha.nato^eb^ ^a^P0.0147^ea^. sammaadi.t.thi a~n~nehipi attano paccaniikakilesehi saddhi.m micchaadi.t.thi.m pajahati, nibbaana.m aaramma.na.m karoti, tappa.ticchaadakamohavidhamanena asammohato sampayuttadhamme ca passati. tathaa sammaasa"nkappaadayopi micchaasa"nkappaadiini ^a^V0.0117^ea^ pajahanti, nibbaana~nca aaramma.na.m karonti, sahajaatadhammaana.m sammaaabhiniropanapariggaha.nasamu.t.thaanavodaanapaggahaupa.t.thaanasamaadahanaani ca karontiiti eva.m ^b^kiccavibhaagato^eb^. sammaadi.t.thi pubbabhaage naanakkha.naa visu.m visu.m dukkhaadiaaramma.naa hutvaa maggakaale ekakkha.naa nibbaanameva aaramma.na.m katvaa kiccato ``dukkhe ~naa.na''ntiaadiini cattaari naamaani labhati, sammaasa"nkappaadayopi pubbabhaage naanakkha.naa naanaaramma.naa maggakaale ekakkha.naa ekaaramma.naa.

[03] tesu sammaasa"nkappo kiccato nekkhammasa"nkappotiaadiini tii.ni naamaani labhati, sammaavaacaadayo tayo pubbabhaage musaavaadaaverama.niitiaadivibhaagaa viratiyopi cetanaayopi hutvaa maggakkha.ne viratiyova, sammaavaayaamasatiyo kiccato sammappadhaanasatipa.t.thaanavasena cattaari naamaani labhanti. sammaasamaadhi pana maggakkha.nepi pa.thamajjhaanaadivasena naanaa evaati eva.m pubbabhaagaparabhaagesu ^b^pavattivibhaagato,^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita''ntiaadinaa (vibha0 489) ^b^bhaavanaavidhito,^eb^ ``tattha katamo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? idha, bhikkhu, yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti...pe0... dukkhaapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye a.t.tha"ngiko maggo hoti sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo''tiaadinaa (vibha0 499) ^b^caturaasiitiyaa nayasahassavibhaagehii^eb^ti eva.m anekaakaarato pavattaani bhagavato ariyamaggavibhaavana~naa.naani atthassa avisa.mvaadanato sabbaanipi tathaani avitathaani ana~n~nathaani. evampi bhagavaa tathaani aagatoti tathaagato.

[03] tathaa pa.thamajjhaanasamaapatti yaa ca nirodhasamaapattiiti etaasu anupa.tipaa.tiyaa viharitabba.t.thena samaapajjitabba.t.thena ca anupubbavihaarasamaapattiisu sampaadanapaccavekkha.naadivasena yathaaraha.m sampayogavasena ca pavattaani bhagavato ~naa.naani tadatthasiddhiyaa tathaani avitathaani ana~n~nathaani ^a^P0.0148^ea^. tathaa ^a^M0.0131^ea^ ``ida.m imassa .thaana.m, ida.m a.t.thaana''nti avipariita.m tassa tassa phalassa kaara.naakaara.najaanana.m, tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m atiitaadibhedabhinnassa kammasamaadaanassa anavasesato yathaabhuuta.m vipaakantarajaanana.m, aayuuhanakkha.neyeva tassa tassa sattassa ``aya.m nirayagaaminii pa.tipadaa...pe0... aya.m nibbaanagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti yaathaavato saasavaanaasavakammavibhaagajaanana.m, 0.khandhaayatanaadiina.m upaadinnaanupaadinnaadianekasabhaava.m naanaasabhaava~nca tassa lokassa ``imaaya naama dhaatuyaa ussannattaa imasmi.m dhammappabandhe aya.m viseso jaayatii''tiaadinaa nayena yathaabhuuta.m dhaatunaanattajaanana.m, anavasesato sattaana.m hiinaadiajjhaasayaadhimuttijaanana.m, saddhaadiindriyaana.m tikkhamudutaajaanana.m, sa.mkilesaadiihi saddhi.m jhaanavimokkhaadivisesajaanana.m ^a^V0.0118^ea^, sattaana.m aparimaa.naasu jaatiisu tappa.tibandhena saddhi.m anavasesato pubbenivutthakkhandhasantatijaanana.m, hiinaadivibhaagehi saddhi.m cutipa.tisandhijaanana.m, ``ida.m dukkha''ntiaadinaa he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva catusaccajaanananti imaani bhagavato dasabala~naa.naani avirajjhitvaa yathaasaka.m visayaavagaahanato yathaadhippetatthasaadhanato ca yathaabhuutavuttiyaa tathaani avitathaani ana~n~nathaani. vutta~nheta.m --
[02] ``idha tathaagato .thaana~nca .thaanato a.t.thaana~nca a.t.thaanato yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaatii''tiaadi (vibha0 809; a0 ni0 10.21).
[03] evampi bhagavaa tathaani aagatoti tathaagato.

[03] yathaa cetesa.m ~naa.naana.m vasena, eva.m yathaavuttaana.m satipa.t.thaanasammappadhaanavibhaavana~naa.naadiina.m anantaaparimeyyabhedaana.m ana~n~nasaadhaara.naana.m pa~n~naavisesaana.m vasena bhagavaa tathaani ~naa.naani aagato adhigatoti tathaagato. evampi tathaani aagatoti tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathaa gatoti tathaagato^eb^? yaa saa bhagavato abhijaati abhisambodhi dhammavinayapa~n~naapanaa anupaadisesanibbaanadhaatu, saa tathaa. ki.m vutta.m hoti? yadattha.m lokanaathena abhisambodhi patthitaa pavattitaa ca, tadatthassa ekantasiddhiyaa avisa.mvaadanato avipariitatthavuttiyaa tathaa avitathaa ana~n~nathaa. tathaa hi aya.m bhagavaa bodhisattabhuuto samati.msapaaramiparipuura.naadika.m ^a^P0.0149^ea^ vuttappabheda.m sabba.m buddhattahetu.m sampaadetvaa ^a^M0.0132^ea^ tusitapure .thitova buddhakolaahala.m sutvaa dasasahassacakkavaa.ladevataahi ekato sannipatitaahi upasa"nkamitvaa --
[21] ``kaalo deva mahaaviira, uppajja maatukucchiya.m.
[22] sadevaka.m taarayanto, bujjhassu amata.m pada''nti.. (bu0 va.m0 1.67) --

[25] aayaacito uppannapubbanimitto pa~nca mahaavilokanaani viloketvaa ``idaanaaha.m manussayoniya.m uppajjitvaa abhisambujjhissaamii''ti aasaa.lhipu.n.namaaya sakyaraajakule mahaamaayaaya deviyaa kucchimhi pa.tisandhi.m gahetvaa dasa maase devamanussehi mahataa parihaarena parihariyamaano visaakhapu.n.namaaya paccuusasamaye abhijaati.m paapu.ni.

[03] abhijaatikkha.ne ^a^V0.0119^ea^ panassa pa.tisandhiggaha.nakkha.ne viya ^b^dvatti.msapubbanimittaani^eb^ paaturahesu.m. aya~nhi dasasahassii lokadhaatu kampi sa"nkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, dasasu cakkavaa.lasahassesu appamaa.no obhaaso phari, tassa ta.m siri.m da.t.thukaamaa viya jaccandhaa cakkhuuni pa.tilabhi.msu, badhiraa sadda.m su.ni.msu. muugaa samaalapi.msu, khujjaa ujugattaa ahesu.m, pa"ngulaa padasaa gamana.m pa.tilabhi.msu, bandhanagataa sabbasattaa andubandhanaadiihi mucci.msu, sabbanirayesu aggi nibbaayi, pettivisaye khuppipaasaa vuupasami, tiracchaanaana.m bhaya.m naahosi, sabbasattaana.m rogo vuupasami, sabbasattaa piya.mvadaa ahesu.m, madhurenaakaarena assaa hasi.msu, vaara.naa gajji.msu, sabbatuuriyaani saka.m saka.m ninnaada.m mu~nci.msu, agha.t.titaani eva manussaana.m hatthuupagaadiini aabhara.naani madhurenaakaarena ravi.msu, sabbadisaa vippasannaa ahesu.m, sattaana.m sukha.m uppaadayamaano mudusiitalavaato vaayi, akaalamegho vassi, pathavitopi udaka.m ubbhijjitvaa vissandi, pakkhino aakaasagamana.m vijahi.msu, nadiyo asandamaanaa a.t.tha.msu, mahaasamudde madhura.m udaka.m ahosi, upakkilesavimutte suuriye dissamaane eva aakaasagataa sabbaa jotiyo jali.msu ^a^P0.0150^ea^, .thapetvaa aruupaavacare deve avasesaa sabbe devaa sabbepi nerayikaa dissamaanaruupaa ahesu.m, taruku.t.takavaa.taselaadayo anaavara.nabhuutaa ahesu.m, sattaana.m cutuupapaataa naahesu.m, sabba.m ani.t.thagandha.m abhibhavitvaa dibbagandho vaayi, sabbe phaluupagaa rukkhaa phaladharaa sampajji.msu, mahaasamuddo ^a^M0.0133^ea^ sabbatthakameva pa~ncava.n.nehi padumehi sa~nchannatalo ahosi, thalajajalajaadiini sabbapupphaani pupphi.msu, rukkhaana.m khandhesu khandhapadumaani, saakhaasu saakhapadumaani, lataasu lataapadumaani pupphi.msu, mahiitale silaatalaani bhinditvaa uparuupari satta satta hutvaa da.n.dapadumaani naama nikkhami.msu, aakaase olambakapadumaani nibbatti.msu, samantato pupphavassa.m vassi, aakaase dibbatuuriyaani vajji.msu, sakaladasasahassii lokadhaatu va.t.tetvaa vissa.t.thamaalaagu.la.m viya uppii.letvaa baddhamaalaakalaapo viya ala"nkatappa.tiyatta.m maalaasana.m viya ca ekamaalaamaalinii vipphurantavaa.labiijanii pupphadhuupagandhaparivaasitaa paramasobhaggappattaa ahosi, taani ca pubbanimittaani upari adhigataana.m anekesa.m visesaadhigamaana.m nimittabhuutaani eva ahesu.m. eva.m anekacchariyapaatubhaavappa.tima.n.ditaa caaya.m abhijaati yadattha.m anena abhisambodhi patthitaa, tassaa abhisambodhiyaa ekantasiddhiyaa tathaava ahosi avitathaa ana~n~nathaa.

[03] tathaa ye buddhaveneyyaa bodhaneyyabandhavaa, te sabbepi anavasesato sayameva bhagavataa viniitaa. ye ca saavakaveneyyaa dhammaveneyyaa ca, tepi saavakaadiihi viniitaa vinaya.m gacchanti gamissanti caati yadattha.m bhagavataa abhisambodhi abhipatthitaa, tadatthassa ekantasiddhiyaa abhisambodhi tathaa avitathaa ana~n~nathaa.

[03] apica ^a^V0.0120^ea^ yassa yassa ~neyyadhammassa yo yo sabhaavo bujjhitabbo, so so hatthatale .thapitaaamalaka.m viya aavajjanamattappa.tibaddhena attano ~naa.nena avipariita.m anavasesato bhagavataa abhisambuddhoti evampi abhisambodhi tathaa avitathaa ana~n~nathaa.

[03] tathaa tesa.m tesa.m dhammaana.m tathaa tathaa desetabbappakaara.m tesa.m tesa~nca sattaana.m aasayaanusayacaritaadhimutti.m sammadeva oloketvaa ^a^P0.0151^ea^ dhammata.m avijahanteneva pa~n~nattinayavohaaramagga.m anatidhaavanteneva ca dhammata.m vibhaavantena yathaaparaadha.m yathaajjhaasaya.m yathaadhamma~nca anusaasantena bhagavataa veneyyaa viniitaa ariyabhuumi.m sampaapitaati dhammavinayapa~n~naapanaapissa tadatthasiddhiyaa yathaabhuutavuttiyaa ca tathaa avitathaa ana~n~nathaa.

[03] tathaa ^a^M0.0134^ea^ yaa saa bhagavataa anuppattaa pathaviyaadiphassavedanaadiruupaaruupasabhaavavinimuttaa lujjanabhaavaabhaavato lokasabhaavaatiitaa tamasaa visa.msa.t.thattaa kenaci anobhaasaniiyaa lokasabhaavaabhaavato eva gatiaadibhaavarahitaa appati.t.thaa anaaramma.naa amatamahaanibbaanadhaatu khandhasa"nkhaataana.m upaadiina.m lesamattassapi abhaavato anupaadisesaati vuccati, ya.m sandhaaya vutta.m --

[02] ``atthi, bhikkhave, tadaayatana.m, yattha neva pathavii na aapo na tejo na vaayo na aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m na vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m na aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m na nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m naaya.m loko na paro loko na ca ubho candimasuuriyaa, tatraapaaha.m, bhikkhave, neva aagati.m vadaami na gati.m na .thiti.m na cuti.m na upapatti.m, appati.t.tha.m appavatta.m anaaramma.nameveta.m, esevanto dukkhassaa''ti (udaa0 71).

[03] saa sabbesampi upaadaanakkhandhaana.m attha"ngamo, sabbasa"nkhaaraana.m samatho, sabbuupadhiina.m pa.tinissaggo, sabbadukkhaana.m vuupasamo, sabbaalayaana.m samugghaato, sabbava.t.taana.m upacchedo, accantasantilakkha.noti yathaavuttasabhaavassa kadaacipi avisa.mvaadanato tathaa avitathaa ana~n~nathaa. evametaa abhijaatiaadikaa tathaa gato upagato adhigato pa.tipanno pattoti tathaagato. eva.m bhagavaa tathaa gatoti tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathaavidhoti tathaagato^eb^? yathaavidhaa purimakaa sammaasambuddhaa, ayampi bhagavaa tathaavidho. ki.m vutta.m hoti? yathaavidhaa te bhagavanto maggasiilena phalasiilena sabbenapi lokiyalokuttarasiilena, maggasamaadhinaa phalasamaadhinaa ^a^P0.0152^ea^ sabbenapi lokiyalokuttarasamaadhinaa, maggapa~n~naaya ^a^V0.0121^ea^ phalapa~n~naaya sabbaayapi lokiyalokuttarapa~n~naaya, devasika.m vala~njitabbehi catuviisatiko.tisatasahassasamaapattivihaarehi, tada"ngavimuttiyaa, vikkhambhanavimuttiyaa, samucchedavimuttiyaa, pa.tippassaddhivimuttiyaa, nissara.navimuttiyaati sa"nkhepato. vitthaarato pana anantaaparimaa.nabhedehi acinteyyaanubhaavehi sakalasabba~n~nugu.nehi, ayampi ^a^M0.0135^ea^ amhaaka.m bhagavaa tathaavidho. sabbesa~nhi sammaasambuddhaana.m aayuvematta.m, sariirappamaa.navematta.m, kulavematta.m, dukkaracariyaavematta.m, rasmivemattanti, imehi pa~ncahi vemattehi siyaa vematta.m, na pana siilavisuddhiyaadiisu visuddhiisu samathavipassanaapa.tipattiya.m attanaa pa.tiladdhagu.nesu ca ki~nci naanaakara.na.m atthi. atha kho majjhe bhinnasuva.n.na.m viya a~n~nama~n~na.m nibbisesaa te buddhaa bhagavanto. tasmaa yathaavidhaa purimakaa sammaasambuddhaa, ayampi bhagavaa tathaavidho. eva.m tathaavidhoti tathaagato. vidhattho cettha gatasaddo, tathaa hi lokiyaa vidhayuttagatasadde pakaaratthe vadanti.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathaa pavattitoti tathaagato^eb^? ana~n~nasaadhaara.nena iddhaanubhaavena samannaagatattaa atthappa.tisambhidaadiina.m ukka.msapaaramippattiyaa anaavara.na~naa.nappa.tilaabhena ca bhagavato kaayappavattiyaadiina.m katthaci pa.tighaataabhaavato yathaa ruci tathaa gata.m gati gamana.m kaayavaciicittappavatti etassaati tathaagato. eva.m tathaa pavattitoti tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathehi agatoti tathaagato^eb^? bodhisambhaarasambhara.ne tappa.tipakkhappavattisa"nkhaata.m natthi etassa gatanti agato. so panassa agatabhaavo maccheradaanapaaramiaadiisu avipariita.m aadiinavaanisa.msapaccavekkha.naadinayappavattehi ~naa.nehiiti tathehi ~naa.nehi agatoti tathaagato.

[03] atha vaa kilesaabhisa"nkhaarappavattisa"nkhaata.m khandhappavattisa"nkhaatameva vaa pa~ncasupi gatiisu gata.m gamana.m etassa natthiiti agato. saupaadisesaanupaadisesanibbaanappattiyaa svaayamassa agatabhaavo tathehi ariyamagga~naa.nehiiti evampi bhagavaa tathehi agatoti tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^a^P0.0153^ea^ ^b^tathaa gatabhaavena tathaagato^eb^? tathaa gatabhaavenaati ca tathaagatassa sabbhaavena atthitaayaati attho. ko panesa tathaagato, yassa atthitaaya bhagavaa tathaagatoti vuccatiiti? saddhammo. saddhammo hi ariyamaggo taava yathaa yuganaddhasamathavipassanaabalena anavasesato kilesapakkha.m samuuhanantena samucchedappahaanavasena gantabba.m ^a^M0.0136^ea^, tathaa gato. phaladhammo yathaa attano maggaanuruupa.m pa.tippassaddhipahaanavasena gantabba.m, tathaa gato pavatto. nibbaanadhammo pana yathaa gato ^a^V0.0122^ea^ pa~n~naaya pa.tividdho sakalava.t.tadukkhavuupasamaaya sampajjati, buddhaadiihi tathaa gato sacchikatoti tathaagato. pariyattidhammopi yathaa purimabuddhehi suttageyyaadivasena pavattiaadippakaasanavasena ca veneyyaana.m aasayaadianuruupa.m pavattito, amhaakampi bhagavataa tathaa gato gadito pavattitoti vaa tathaagato. yathaa bhagavataa desito, tathaa bhagavato saavakehi gato avagatoti tathaagato. eva.m sabbopi saddhammo tathaagato. tenaaha sakko devaanamindo -- ``tathaagata.m devamanussapuujita.m, dhamma.m namassaama suvatthi hotuu''ti (khu0 paa0 6.17; su0 ni0 240). svaassa atthiiti bhagavaa tathaagato.

[03] yathaa ca dhammo, eva.m ariyasa"nghopi yathaa attahitaaya parahitaaya ca pa.tipannehi suvisuddha.m pubbabhaagasamathavipassanaapa.tipada.m purakkhatvaa tena tena maggena gantabba.m, ta.m ta.m tathaa gatoti tathaagato. yathaa vaa bhagavataa saccapa.ticcasamuppaadaadayo desitaa, tathaava buddhattaa tathaa gadanato ca tathaagato. tenaaha sakko devaraajaa -- ``tathaagata.m devamanussapuujita.m, sa"ngha.m namassaama suvatthi hotuu''ti. svaassa saavakabhuuto atthiiti bhagavaa tathaagato. eva.m tathaagatabhaavena tathaagatoti.

[03] idampi ca tathaagatassa tathaagatabhaavadiipane mukhamattakameva, sabbaakaarena pana tathaagatova tathaagatassa ^a^P0.0154^ea^ tathaagatabhaava.m va.n.neyya. ida~nhi tathaagatapada.m mahattha.m mahaagatika.m mahaavisaya.m, tassa appamaadapadassa viya tepi.takampi buddhavacana.m yuttito atthabhaavena aaharanto ``atitthena dhammakathiko pakkhando''ti na vattabboti.
[03] tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``yatheva loke purimaa mahesino,
[27] sabba~n~nubhaava.m munayo idhaagataa.
[26] tathaa aya.m sakyamuniipi aagato,
[22] tathaagato vuccati tena cakkhumaa..
[21] ``pahaaya ^a^M0.0137^ea^ kaamaadimale asesato,
[27] samaadhi~naa.nehi yathaa gataa jinaa.
[26] puraatanaa ^a^V0.0123^ea^ sakyamunii jutindharo,
[22] tathaa gato tena tathaagato mato..
[21] ``tatha~nca dhaataayatanaadilakkha.na.m,
[27] sabhaavasaama~n~navibhaagabhedato.
[26] sayambhu~naa.nena jinoyamaagato,
[22] tathaagato vuccati sakyapu"ngavo..
[21] ``tathaani saccaani samantacakkhunaa,
[27] tathaa idappaccayataa ca sabbaso.
[26] ana~n~naneyyaa nayato vibhaavitaa,
[22] tathaa gato tena jino tathaagato..
[21] ``anekabhedaasupi lokadhaatusu,
[27] jinassa ruupaayatanaadigocare.
[26] vicittabhede tathameva dassana.m,
[22] tathaagato tena samantalocano..
[21] ``yato ^a^P0.0155^ea^ ca dhamma.m tathameva bhaasati,
[27] karoti vaacaaya nuruupamattano.
[26] gu.nehi loka.m abhibhuyyiriiyati,
[22] tathaagato tenapi lokanaayako..
[21] ``tathaa pari~n~naaya tathaaya sabbaso,
[27] avedi loka.m pabhava.m atikkami.
[26] gato ca paccakkhakiriyaaya nibbuti.m,
[22] ariiyamagga~nca gato tathaagato..
[21] ``tathaa pa.ti~n~naaya tathaaya sabbaso,
[27] hitaaya lokassa yatoyamaagato.
[26] tathaaya ^a^V0.0124^ea^ naatho karu.naaya sabbadaa,
[22] gato ca tenaapi jino tathaagato..
[21] ``tathaani ^a^M0.0138^ea^ ~naa.naani yatoyamaagato,
[27] yathaasabhaava.m visayaavabodhato.
[26] tathaabhijaatippabhutii tathaagato,
[22] tadatthasampaadanato tathaagato..
[21] ``yathaavidhaa te purimaa mahesino,
[27] tathaavidhoyampi tathaa yathaaruci.
[26] pavattavaacaa tanucittabhaavato,
[22] tathaagato vuccati aggapuggalo..
[21] ``sambodhisambhaaravipakkhato pure,
[27] gata.m na sa.msaaragatampi tassa vaa.
[26] na catthi naathassa bhavantadassino,
[22] tathehi tasmaa agato tathaagato..
[21] ``tathaagato dhammavaro mahesinaa,
[27] yathaa pahaatabbamala.m pahiiyati.
[26] tathaagato ariyaga.nopi satthuno,
[22] tathaagato tena sama"ngibhaavato''ti..

[03] ^b^mahiddhikataa^eb^ti ^a^P0.0156^ea^ paramena cittavasiibhaavena ca iddhividhayogena dhammaanubhaava~n~nathattanipphaadanasamatthataasa"nkhaataaya mahatiyaa iddhiyaa samannaagamo ^b^mahiddhikataa^eb^. cirakaalasambhuutena suviduurappa.tipakkhena icchitatthanipphattihetubhuutena mahaajutikena pu~n~natejena samannaagamo ^b^mahaanubhaavataa. yatraa^eb^ti acchariyapasa.msaakotuhalahaasapasaadiko paccattatthe nipaato. tena yuttattaa ^b^vijaayissatii^eb^ti anaagatakaalavacana.m, attho pana atiitakaaloyeva. aya~nhettha attho -- yaa hi naama aya.m suppavaasaa tathaa dukkhanimuggaa kicchaapannaa bhagavato vacanasamakaalameva sukhinii arogaa aroga.m putta.m vijaayiiti. ^b^attamano^eb^ti sakamano, bhagavati pasaadena kilesarahitacittoti ^a^V0.0125^ea^ attho. kilesapariyu.t.thita~nhi citta.m vase avattanato attamanoti na sakkaa vattunti. ^b^attamano^eb^ti vaa piitisomanassehi gahitamano. ^b^pamudito^eb^ti paamojjena ^a^M0.0139^ea^ yutto. ^b^piitisomanassajaato^eb^ti jaatabalavapiitisomanasso. ^b^athaa^eb^ti pacchaa, tato katipaahassa accayena. ^b^sattabhattaanii^eb^ti sattasu divasesu daatabbabhattaani. ^b^svaatanaayaa^eb^ti svaatanapu~n~nattha.m, ya.m sve buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa daanavasena payirupaasanavasena ca bhavissati pu~n~na.m tadattha.m.

[03] ^b^atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m aamantesii^eb^ti kasmaa aamantesi? suppavaasaaya saamikassa pasaadarakkha.nattha.m. suppavaasaa pana acalappasaadaava, upaasakassa pana pasaadarakkha.na.m mahaamoggallaanattherassa bhaaro. tenaaha ^b^``tuyheso upa.t.thaako''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^tuyheso^eb^ti tuyha.m eso. ^b^ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m paa.tibhogo^eb^ti mama bhogaadiina.m ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m ahaaniyaa avinaasaaya ayyo mahaamoggallaano yadi paa.tibhogo yadi patibhuu, ito satta divase atikkamitvaa mama sakkaa daana.m daatunti yadi ayyena ~naatanti diipeti. theropi tassa tesu divasesu bhogaana.m jiivitassa ca anupaddava.m passitvaa aaha -- ^b^``dvinna.m kho nesa.m, aavuso, dhammaana.m paa.tibhogo bhogaana~nca jiivitassa caa''^eb^ti. saddhaa panassa cittappa.tibaddhaati tasseva bhaara.m karonto ^b^``saddhaaya pana tva~n~neva paa.tibhogo''^eb^ti aaha. api ca so upaasako di.t.thasacco, tassa saddhaaya a~n~nathaabhaavo natthiiti tathaa vutta.m. teneva ca kaara.nena bhagavataa ^b^``pacchaapi tva.m karissasiiti sa~n~naapehii''^eb^ti vutta.m. upaasakopi ^a^P0.0157^ea^ satthari there ca gaaravena subbacataaya tassaa ca pu~n~nena va.d.dhi.m icchanto ^b^``karotu suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa satta bhattaani, pacchaaha.m karissaamii''^eb^ti anujaani.

[03] ^b^ta~nca daaraka^eb^nti vijaatadivasato pa.t.thaaya ekaadasama.m divasa.m atikkamitvaa tato para.m sattaaha.m buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m bhojetvaa sattame divase ta.m sattavassika.m daaraka.m bhagavanta.m bhikkhusa"ngha~nca vandaapesi. ^b^satta me vassaanii^eb^ti satta me sa.mvaccharaani, accantasa.myogavasena ceta.m upayogavacana.m. ^b^lohitakumbhiya.m vutthaanii^eb^ti maatukucchiya.m attano gabbhavaasadukkha.m sandhaaya vadati. ^b^a~n~naanipi evaruupaani satta puttaanii^eb^ti ``a~n~nepi evaruupe satta putte''ti vattabbe li"ngavipallaasavasena vutta.m ``evaruupaanii''ti. eva.m satta vassaani gabbhadhaara.navasena sattaaha.m muu.lhagabbhataaya ca mahanta.m dukkha.m ^a^M0.0140^ea^ paapetvaa uppajjanakaputteti attho. etena maatugaamaana.m puttalolataaya puttalaabhena titti natthiiti dasseti.

[03] ^b^etamattha.m viditvaa^eb^ti eta.m sattadivasaadhikaani satta sa.mvaccharaani gabbhadhaara.naadivasena pavatta.m ^a^V0.0126^ea^ mahanta.m dukkha.m ekapade visaritvaa puttalolataavasena taaya vuttamattha.m viditvaa. ^b^ima.m udaana^eb^nti ima.m cittasukhappamatto viya pamattapuggale i.t.thaakaarena va~ncetvaa ta.nhaasinehassa mahaanatthakarabhaavadiipaka.m udaana.m udaanesi.

[03] tattha ^b^asaata^eb^nti amadhura.m asundara.m ani.t.tha.m. ^b^saataruupenaa^eb^ti i.t.thasabhaavena. ^b^piyaruupenaa^eb^ti piyaayitabbabhaavena. ^b^sukhassa ruupenaa^eb^ti sukhasabhaavena. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yasmaa asaata.m appiya.m dukkhameva samaana.m sakalampi va.t.tagata.m sa"nkhaarajaata.m appahiinavipallaasattaa ayonisomanasikaarena i.t.tha.m viya piya.m viya sukha.m viya ca hutvaa upa.t.thahamaana.m sativippavaasena pamattapuggala.m ativattati abhibhavati ajjhottharati, tasmaa imampi suppavaasa.m punapi sattakkhattu.m evaruupa.m asaata.m appiya.m dukkha.m saataadipatiruupakena dukkhena puttasa"nkhaatapemavatthusukhena ajjhottharatiiti.
[06] a.t.thamasuttava.n.nanaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^P0.0158^ea^ ^b^pubbaaraame^eb^ti saavatthiyaa paaciinadisaabhaage anuraadhapurassa uttamadeviivihaarasadise .thaane kaarite aaraame. ^b^migaaramaatupaasaade^eb^ti migaaramaatuyaa paasaade.

[03] tatraaya.m anupubbikathaa -- atiite satasahassakappamatthake padumuttaradasabala.m ekaa upaasikaa a~n~natara.m upaasika.m attano aggupa.t.thaayika.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa bhagavanta.m nimantetvaa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusatasahassassa daana.m datvaa bhagavato nipaccakaara.m katvaa ``anaagate tumhaadisassa ^a^M0.0141^ea^ buddhassa aggupa.t.thaayikaa bhaveyya''nti patthana.m akaasi. saa kappasatasahassa.m devesu ca manussesu ca sa.msaritvaa amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale bhaddiyanagare me.n.dakase.t.thiputtassa dhana~njayase.t.thino gehe sumanadeviyaa kucchismi.m pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. jaatakaale cassaa ^b^visaakhaa^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu. saa yadaa bhagavaa bhaddiyanagara.m agamaasi, tadaa pa~ncahi daarikaasatehi saddhi.m bhagavato paccuggamana.m katvaa pa.thamadassaneneva sotaapannaa ahosi.

[03] aparabhaage saavatthiya.m migaarase.t.thiputtassa pu.n.nava.d.dhanakumaarassa geha.m gataa, tattha na.m sasuro migaarase.t.thi ^a^V0.0127^ea^ upakaaravasena maatu.t.thaane .thapesi. tasmaa ^b^migaaramaataa^eb^ti vuccati. saa attano mahallataapasaadhana.m vissajjetvaa navako.tiihi bhagavato bhikkhusa"nghassa ca vasanatthaaya kariisamatte bhuumibhaage uparibhuumiya.m pa~ncagabbhasataani he.t.thaabhuumiya.m pa~ncagabbhasataaniiti gabbhasahassehi pa.tima.n.dita.m paasaada.m kaaresi. tena vutta.m ^b^``migaaramaatupaasaade''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^kocideva attho^eb^ti ki~ncideva payojana.m. ^b^ra~n~ne^eb^ti raajini. ^b^pa.tibaddho^eb^ti aayatto. visaakhaaya ~naatikulato ma.nimuttaadiracita.m taadisa.m bha.n.dajaata.m tassaa pa.n.naakaaratthaaya pesita.m, ta.m ^a^P0.0159^ea^ nagaradvaarappatta.m su"nkikaa tattha su"nka.m ga.nhantaa tadanuruupa.m aggahetvaa atireka.m ga.nhi.msu. ta.m sutvaa visaakhaa ra~n~no tamattha.m nivedetukaamaa patiruupaparivaarena raajanivesana.m agamaasi, tasmi.m kha.ne raajaa mallikaaya deviyaa saddhi.m antepura.m gato hoti. visaakhaa okaasa.m alabhamaanaa ``idaani labhissaami, idaani labhissaamii''ti bhojanavela.m atikkamitvaa chinnabhattaa hutvaa pakkaami. eva.m dviihatiiha.m gantvaapi okaasa.m na labhiyeva. iti raajaa aniveditopi tassa atthavinicchayassa okaasaakara.nena ^b^``yathaadhippaaya.m na tiiretii''^eb^ti vutto. tattha ^b^yathaadhippaaya^eb^nti adhippaayaanuruupa.m. ^b^na tiiretii^eb^ti na ni.t.thaapeti. mahaaupaasikaaya hi raajaayattasu"nkameva ra~n~no datvaa itara.m vissajjaapetu.m adhippaayo, so ra~n~naa na di.t.thattaa eva na tiirito. ^b^handaa^eb^ti vossaggatthe nipaato. ^b^divaa divassaa^eb^ti divasassa divaa, majjhanhike kaaleti attho. kenacideva kara.niiyena dviihatiiha.m raajanivesanadvaara.m gacchantii tassa atthassa ani.t.thitattaa niratthakameva upasa"nkami.m ^a^M0.0142^ea^, bhagavati upasa"nkamanameva pana dassanaanuttariyaadippa.tilaabhakaara.nattaa saatthakanti evaaha.m, bhante, imaaya velaaya idhaagataati imamattha.m dassentii mahaaupaasikaa ^b^``idha me, bhante''^eb^tiaadimaaha.

[03] ^b^etamattha^eb^nti eta.m paraayattataaya adhippaayaasamijjhanasa"nkhaata.m attha.m viditvaa. ^b^ima.m udaana^eb^nti ima.m paraadhiinaaparaadhiinavuttiisu aadiinavaanisa.msaparidiipaka.m udaana.m udaanesi.

[03] tattha ^b^sabba.m paravasa.m dukkha^eb^nti ya.m ki~nci atthajaata.m payojana.m paravasa.m paraayatta.m attano icchaaya nipphaadetu.m asakku.neyyataaya dukkha.m dukkhaavaha.m hotiiti attho. ^b^sabba.m issariya.m sukha^eb^nti duvidha.m issariya.m lokiya.m lokuttara~nca. tattha lokiya.m raajissariyaadi ceva lokiyajjhaanaabhi~n~naanibbatta.m cittissariya~nca, lokuttara.m maggaphalaadhigamanimitta.m nirodhissariya.m. tesu ya.m cakkavattibhaavapariyosaana.m manussesu issariya.m, ya~nca sakkaadiina.m tasmi.m tasmi.m devanikaaye aadhipaccabhuuta.m issariya.m, tadubhaya.m yadipi kammaanubhaavena yathicchitanipphattiyaa sukhanimittataaya ^a^V0.0128^ea^ sukha.m, vipari.naamadukkhataaya pana sabbathaa dukkhameva. tathaa aniccantikataaya ^a^P0.0160^ea^ lokiyajjhaananibbatta.m cittissariya.m, nirodhissariyameva pana lokadhammehi akampaniiyato anivattisabhaavattaa ca ekantasukha.m naama. ya.m panettha sabbattheva aparaadhiinataaya labhati cittasukha.m, ta.m sandhaaya satthaa ``sabba.m issariya.m sukha''nti aaha.

[03] ^b^saadhaara.ne viha~n~nantii^eb^ti ida.m ``sabba.m paravasa.m dukkha''nti imassa padassa atthavivara.na.m. aya~nhettha attho -- saadhaara.ne payojane saadhetabbe sati tassa paraadhiinataaya yathaadhippaaya.m anipphaadanato ime sattaa viha~n~nanti vighaata.m aapajjanti kilamanti. kasmaa? ^b^yogaa hi duratikkamaa^eb^ti yasmaa kaamayogabhavayogadi.t.thiyogaavijjaayogaa anaadikaalabhaavitaa anupacitakusalasambhaarehi pajahitu.m asakku.neyyataaya duratikkamaa. etesu di.t.thiyogo pa.thamamaggena atikkamitabbo, kaamayogo tatiyamaggena. itare aggamaggena. iti ariyamaggaana.m duradhigamaniiyattaa ime yogaa duratikkamaa. tasmaa kaamayogaadivasena icchitaalaabhahetu sattaa viha~n~nanti, asaadhaara.ne pana cittissariye ^a^M0.0143^ea^ nirodhissariye ca sati na kadaacipi vighaatassa sambhavoti adhippaayo.

[03] atha vaa ^b^sabba.m paravasa^eb^nti ya.m attano a~n~nappa.tibaddhavuttisa"nkhaata.m, ta.m sabba.m aniccasabhaavataaya dukkha.m. ``yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha''nti hi vutta.m. ^b^sabba.m issariya^eb^nti ya.m sabbasa"nkhatanissa.ta.m issariya.t.thaanataaya issariyanti laddhanaama.m nibbaana.m, ta.m upaadisesaadivibhaaga.m sabba.m sukha.m. ``nibbaana.m parama.m sukha''nti (dha0 pa0 203-204) hi vutta.m. ^b^saadhaara.ne^eb^ti eva.m dukkhasukhe vavatthite ime sattaa bahusaadhaara.ne dukkhakaara.ne nimuggaa hutvaa viha~n~nanti. kasmaa? ^b^yogaa hi duratikkamaa^eb^ti yasmaa te sabbattha nimujjanassa hetubhuutaa kaamayogaadayo duratikkamaa, tasmaa tvampi visaakhe paraayattamattha.m patthetvaa alabhamaanaa viha~n~nasiiti adhippaayo.
[06] navamasuttava.n.nanaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V0.0129^ea^ ^a^P0.0161^ea^ ^b^anupiyaaya^eb^nti eva.m naamake nagare. ^b^ambavane^eb^ti tassa nagarassa aviduure mallaraajuuna.m eka.m ambavana.m ahosi, tattha mallaraajuuhi bhagavato vihaaro kaarito, so ``ambavana''ntveva vuccati. anupiya.m gocaragaama.m katvaa tattha bhagavaa viharati, tena vutta.m ^b^``anupiyaaya.m viharati ambavane''^eb^ti. ^b^bhaddiyo^eb^ti tassa therassa naama.m. ^b^kaa.liigodhaaya putto^eb^ti kaa.liigodhaa naama saakiyaanii sakyaraajadevii ariyasaavikaa aagataphalaa vi~n~naatasaasanaa, tassaa aya.m putto. tassa pabbajjaavidhi khandhake (cuu.lava0 330-331) aagatova. so pabbajitvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa na cirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi, terasapi dhuta"ngaani samaadaaya vattati. bhagavataa ca ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m uccakulikaana.m, yadida.m bhaddiyo kaa.liigodhaaya putto''ti (a0 ni0 1.193) uccakulikabhaave etadagge .thapito asiitiyaa saavakaana.m abbhantaro.

[03] ^b^su~n~naagaaragato^eb^ti ``.thapetvaa gaama~nca gaamuupacaara~nca avasesa.m ara~n~na''nti vutta.m ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula~nca .thapetvaa a~n~na.m pabbatakandaraadi pabbajitasaaruppa.m nivaasa.t.thaana.m ^a^M0.0144^ea^ janasambaadhaabhaavato idha su~n~naagaaranti adhippeta.m. atha vaa jhaanaka.n.takaana.m saddaana.m abhaavato vivitta.m ya.m ki~nci agaarampi su~n~naagaaranti veditabba.m. ta.m su~n~naagaara.m upagato. ^b^abhikkha.na^eb^nti bahula.m. ^b^udaana.m udaanesii^eb^ti so hi aayasmaa ara~n~ne divaavihaara.m upagatopi rattivaasuupagatopi yebhuyyena phalasamaapattisukhena nirodhasukhena ca viitinaameti, tasmaa ta.m sukha.m sandhaaya pubbe attanaa anubhuuta.m sabhaya.m sapari.laaha.m rajjasukha.m jigucchitvaa ^b^``aho sukha.m aho sukha''^eb^nti somanassasahita.m ~naa.nasamu.t.thaana.m piitisamu.t.thaana.m samuggirati.

[03] ^b^sutvaana nesa.m etadahosii^eb^ti nesa.m sambahulaana.m bhikkhuuna.m tassa aayasmato ``aho sukha.m, aho sukha''nti udaanentassa udaana.m sutvaa ``nissa.msaya.m esa anabhirato brahmacariya.m caratii''ti eva.m parivitakkita.m ahosi. te bhikkhuu puthujjanaa tassa aayasmato vivekasukha.m sandhaaya udaana.m ajaanantaa ^a^P0.0162^ea^ eva.m ama~n~ni.msu, tena vutta.m ^b^``nissa.msaya''^eb^ntiaadi. tattha ^b^nissa.msaya^eb^nti asandehena ekantenaati attho. ``ya.m so pubbe agaariyabhuuto samaano''ti paa.li.m vatvaa ``anubhavii''ti vacanasesena keci attha.m va.n.nenti, apare ``ya.m saa''ti pa.thanti, ``ya.msa pubbe agaariyabhuutassaa''ti pana paa.li. tattha ^b^ya.msaa^eb^ti ya.m assa, sandhivasena hi akaarasakaaralopo ``eva.msa te (ma0 ni0 1.23; a0 ni0 6.58), puppha.msaa uppajjii''tiaadiisu ^a^V0.0130^ea^ (paaraa0 36) viya. tassattho -- assa aayasmato bhaddiyassa pabbajitato pubbe agaariyabhuutassa gaha.t.thassa sato ya.m rajjasukha.m anubhuuta.m. ^b^saa tamanussaramaano^eb^ti so ta.m sukha.m etarahi ukka.n.thanavasena anussaranto.

[03] ^b^te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu^eb^nti te sambahulaa bhikkhuu ullapanasabhaavasa.n.thitaa tassa anuggaha.naadhippaayena bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m, na ujjhaanavasena. ^b^a~n~natara^eb^nti naamagottena apaaka.ta.m eka.m bhikkhu.m. ^b^aamantesii^eb^ti aa.naapesi te bhikkhuu sa~n~naapetukaamo. ^b^eva^eb^nti vacanasampa.tiggahe, saadhuuti attho. puna ^b^eva^eb^nti pa.ti~n~naaya. ^b^abhikkha.na.m ``aho sukha.m, aho sukha''nti ima.m udaana.m udaanesii^eb^ti yathaa te bhikkhuu vadanti, ta.m eva.m tathevaati attano udaana.m pa.tijaanaati. ^b^ki.m pana tva.m bhaddiyaa^eb^ti kasmaa bhagavaa pucchati, ki.m tassa citta.m na jaanaatiiti ^a^M0.0145^ea^? no na jaanaati, teneva pana tamattha.m vadaapetvaa te bhikkhuu sa~n~naapetu.m pucchati. vutta~nheta.m -- ``jaanantaapi tathaagataa pucchanti, jaanantaapi na pucchantii''tiaadi. ^b^atthavasa^eb^nti kaara.na.m.

[03] ^b^antepure^eb^ti itthaagaarassa sa~ncara.na.t.thaanabhuute raajagehassa abbhantare, yattha raajaa nhaanabhojanasayanaadi.m kappeti. ^b^rakkhaa susa.mvihitaa^eb^ti aarakkhaadikatapurisehi gutti su.t.thu samantato vihitaa. ^b^bahipi antepure^eb^ti a.d.dakara.na.t.thaanaadike antepurato bahibhuute raajagehe. ^b^eva.m rakkhito gopito santo^eb^ti eva.m raajageharaajadhaanirajjadesesu anto ca bahi ca anekesu .thaanesu anekasatehi susa.mvihitarakkhaavara.naguttiyaa mameva nibbhayattha.m phaasuvihaarattha.m rakkhito gopito samaano. ^b^bhiito^eb^tiaadiini padaani a~n~nama~n~navevacanaani. atha ^a^P0.0163^ea^ vaa ^b^bhiito^eb^ti pararaajuuhi bhaayamaano. ^b^ubbiggo^eb^ti sakarajjepi pakatito uppajjanakabhayubbegena ubbiggo calito. ^b^ussa"nkii^eb^ti ``ra~n~naa naama sabbakaala.m avissatthena bhavitabba''nti vacanena sabbattha avissaasavasena tesa.m tesa.m kiccakara.niiyaana.m paccayaparisa"nkaaya ca uddhamukha.m sa"nkamaano. ^b^utraasii^eb^ti ``santikaavacarehipi ajaanantasseva me kadaaci anattho bhaveyyaa''ti uppannena sariirakampa.m uppaadanasamatthena taasena utraasii. ``utrasto''tipi pa.thanti. ^b^vihaasi^eb^nti eva.mbhuuto hutvaa vihari.m.

[03] ^b^etarahii^eb^ti idaani pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya. ^b^eko^eb^ti asahaayo, tena vuupaka.t.thakaayata.m dasseti. ^b^abhiito^eb^tiaadiina.m padaana.m vuttavipariyaayena attho veditabbo. bhayaadinimittassa pariggahassa ta.m nimittassa ca kilesassa abhaavenevassa abhiitaaditaati. etena cittaviveka.m dasseti ^a^V0.0131^ea^. ^b^appossukko^eb^ti sariiraguttiya.m nirussukko. ^b^pannalomo^eb^ti lomaha.msuppaadakassa chambhitattassa abhaavena anuggatalomo. padadvayenapi serivihaara.m dasseti. ^b^paradattavutto^eb^ti parehi dinnena ciivaraadinaa vattamaano, etena sabbaso sa"ngaabhaavadiipanamukhena anavasesabhayahetuviraha.m dasseti. ^b^migabhuutena cetasaa^eb^ti vissatthavihaaritaaya migassa viya jaatena cittena. migo hi amanussapathe ara~n~ne vasamaano ^a^M0.0146^ea^ vissattho ti.t.thati, nisiidati, nipajjati, yenakaama~nca pakkamati appa.tihatacaaro, eva.m ahampi viharaamiiti dasseti. vutta~nheta.m paccekabuddhena --
[21] ``migo ara~n~namhi yathaa abaddho,
[27] yenicchaka.m gacchati gocaraaya.
[26] vi~n~nuu naro serita.m pekkhamaano,
[22] eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo''ti.. (su0 ni0 39; apa0 thera 1.1.95).

[03] ^b^ima.m kho aha.m, bhante, atthavasa^eb^nti, bhante, bhagavaa yadida.m mama etarahi parama.m vivekasukha.m phalasamaapattisukha.m, idameva kaara.na.m sampassamaano ``aho sukha.m, aho sukha''nti udaana.m udaanesinti.

[03] ^b^etamattha^eb^nti eta.m bhaddiyattherassa ^a^P0.0164^ea^ puthujjanavisayaatiita.m vivekasukhasa"nkhaatamattha.m sabbaakaarato viditvaa. ^b^ima.m udaana^eb^nti ida.m sahetukabhayasokavigamaanubhaavadiipaka.m udaana.m udaanesi.

[03] tattha ^b^yassantarato na santi kopaa^eb^ti yassa ariyapuggalassa antarato abbhantare attano citte cittakaalussiyakara.nato cittappakopaa raagaadayo aaghaatavatthuaadikaara.nabhedato anekabhedaa dosakopaa eva kopaa na santi maggena pahiinattaa na vijjanti. aya~nhi antarasaddo ki~ncaapi ``ma~nca tva~nca kimantara''ntiaadiisu (sa.m0 ni0 1.228) kaara.ne dissati, ``antara.t.thake himapaatasamaye''tiaadiisu (mahaava0 346) vemajjhe, ``antaraa ca jetavana.m antaraa ca saavatthi''ntiaadiisu (udaa0 13, 44) vivare, ``bhayamantarato jaata''ntiaadiisu (itivu0 88; mahaani0 5) citte, idhaapi citte eva da.t.thabbo. tena vutta.m ``antarato attano citte''ti.

[03] ^b^itibhavaabhavata~nca viitivatto^eb^ti yasmaa bhavoti sampatti, abhavoti vipatti. tathaa bhavoti ^a^V0.0132^ea^ vuddhi, abhavoti haani. bhavoti vaa sassata.m, abhavoti ucchedo. bhavoti vaa pu~n~na.m, abhavoti paapa.m. bhavoti vaa sugati, abhavoti duggati. bhavoti vaa khuddako, abhavoti mahanto. tasmaa yaa saa sampattivipattivu.d.dhihaanisassatucchedapu~n~napaapasugatiduggati- khuddakamahantaupapattibhavaana.m vasena iti anekappakaaraa bhavaabhavataa vuccati. catuuhipi ^a^M0.0147^ea^ ariyamaggehi yathaasambhava.m tena tena nayena ta.m itibhavaabhavata~nca viitivatto atikkanto hoti. atthavasena vibhatti vipari.naametabbaa. ^b^ta.m vigatabhaya^eb^nti ta.m evaruupa.m yathaavuttagu.nasamannaagata.m khii.naasava.m cittakopaabhaavato itibhavaabhavasamatikkamato ca bhayahetuvigamena vigatabhaya.m, vivekasukhena aggaphalasukhena ca ^b^sukhi.m,^eb^ vigatabhayattaa eva ^b^asoka.m. devaa naanubhavanti dassanaayaa^eb^ti adhigatamagge .thapetvaa sabbepi upapattidevaa vaayamantaapi cittacaaradassanavasena dassanaaya da.t.thu.m naanubhavanti na abhisambhu.nanti na sakkonti, pageva manussaa. sekkhaapi hi puthujjanaa viya arahato cittappavatti.m na jaananti.
[06] dasamasuttava.n.nanaa ni.t.thitaa.
[06] ni.t.thitaa ca mucalindavaggava.n.nanaa.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ nandavaggassa ^a^V0.0133^ea^ ^a^M0.0148^ea^ ^a^P0.0165^ea^ pa.thame ^b^a~n~nataro bhikkhuu^eb^ti naamagottena apaaka.to eko khii.naasavabhikkhu. so kira raajagahavaasii kulaputto moggallaanattherena sa.mvejito sa.msaaradosa.m disvaa satthu santike pabbajitvaa siilaani sodhetvaa catusaccakamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa na cirasseva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tassa aparabhaage kharo aabaadho uppajji, so paccavekkha.naaya adhivaasento viharati. khii.naasavaana~nhi cetasikadukkha.m naama natthi, kaayikadukkha.m pana hotiyeva. so ekadivasa.m bhagavato dhamma.m desentassa naatiduure .thaane dukkha.m adhivaasento palla"nkena nisiidi. tena vutta.m ^b^``bhagavato aviduure nisinno hotii''^eb^tiaadi.

[03] tattha ^b^palla"nka^eb^nti samantato uurubaddhaasana.m. ^b^aabhujitvaa^eb^ti bandhitvaa. ^b^uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaayaa^eb^ti uparima.m sariira.m ujuka.m .thapetvaa a.t.thaarasa pi.t.thika.n.take ko.tiyaa ko.ti.m pa.tipaadetvaa. eva~nhi nisinnassa cammama.msanhaaruuni na namanti, tasmaa so tathaa nisinno hoti. ^b^puraa.nakammavipaakaja^eb^nti pubbe katassa kammassa vipaakabhaavena jaata.m, puraa.nakammavipaake vaa sukhadukkhappakaare vipaakava.t.tasamudaaye tadekadesabhaavena jaata.m. ki.m ta.m? dukkha.m. puraa.nakammavipaakajanti ca iminaa tassa aabaadhassa kammasamu.t.thaanata.m dassento opakkamikautuvipari.naamajaadibhaava.m pa.tikkhipati. ^b^dukkha^eb^nti pacurajanehi khamitu.m asakku.neyya.m. ^b^tibba^eb^nti ^a^P0.0166^ea^ tikhi.na.m, abhibhavitvaa pavattiyaa bahala.m vaa. ^b^khara^eb^nti kakkha.la.m. ^b^ka.tuka^eb^nti asaata.m. ^b^adhivaasento^eb^ti upari vaasento sahanto khamanto.

[03] ^b^sato sampajaano^eb^ti vedanaapariggaahakaana.m satisampaja~n~naana.m vasena satimaa sampajaananto ca. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- ``aya.m vedanaa naama hutvaa abhaava.t.thena aniccaa, ani.t.thaaramma.naadipaccaye pa.ticca uppannattaa pa.ticcasamuppannaa, uppajjitvaa ekantena bhijjanasabhaavattaa khayadhammaa vayadhammaa viraagadhammaa nirodhadhammaa''ti vedanaaya aniccataasallakkha.navasena satokaaritaaya ^a^V0.0134^ea^ ^b^sato^eb^ ^a^M0.0149^ea^, avipariitasabhaavapa.tivijjhanavasena ^b^sampajaano^eb^ ca hutvaa. atha vaa sativepullapattiyaa sabbattheva kaayavedanaacittadhammesu su.t.thu upa.t.thitasatitaaya ^b^sato,^eb^ tathaa pa~n~naavepullappattiyaa pariggahitasa"nkhaarataaya ^b^sampajaano. aviha~n~namaano^eb^ti ``assutavaa, bhikkhave, puthujjano a~n~natara~n~natarena dukkhadhammena phu.t.tho samaano socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati sammoha.m aapajjatii''ti vuttanayena andhaputhujjano viya na viha~n~namaano maggeneva samugghaatitattaa cetodukkha.m anuppaadento kevala.m kammavipaakaja.m sariiradukkha.m adhivaasento samaapatti.m samaapanno viya nisinno hoti. ^b^addasaa^eb^ti ta.m aayasmanta.m adhivaasanakhantiyaa tathaa nisinna.m addakkhi.

[03] ^b^etamattha^eb^nti eta.m taadisassapi rogassa vejjaadiihi tikicchanattha.m anussukkaapajjanakaara.na.m khii.naasavaana.m lokadhammehi anupalepitasa"nkhaata.m attha.m sabbaakaarato viditvaa. ^b^ima.m udaana^eb^nti ima.m sa"nkhatadhammaana.m yehi kehici dukkhadhammehi avighaatapattivibhaavana.m udaana.m udaanesi.

[03] tattha ^b^sabbakammajahassaa^eb^ti pahiinasabbakammassa. aggamaggassa hi uppannakaalato pa.t.thaaya arahato sabbaani kusalaakusalakammaani pahiinaani naama honti pa.tisandhi.m daatu.m asamatthabhaavato, yato ariyamagga~naa.na.m kammakkhayakaranti vuccati. ^b^bhikkhuno^eb^ti bhinnakilesataaya bhikkhuno. ^b^dhunamaanassa pure kata.m raja^eb^nti arahattappattito pubbe kata.m raagarajaadimissataaya rajanti laddhanaama.m dukkhavedaniiya.m kamma.m vipaakapa.tisa.mvedanena ta.m ^a^P0.0167^ea^ dhunantassa viddha.msentassa, arahattappattiyaa parato pana saavajjakiriyaaya sambhavoyeva natthi, anavajjakiriyaa ca bhavamuulassa samucchinnattaa samucchinnamuulataaya puppha.m viya phaladaanasamatthataaya abhaavato kiriyamattaava hoti.

[03] ^b^amamassaa^eb^ti ruupaadiisu katthaci mamanti gaha.naabhaavato amamassa mama"nkaararahitassa. yassa hi mama"nkaaro atthi, so attasinehena vejjaadiihi sariira.m pa.tijaggaapeti. arahaa pana amamo, tasmaa so sariirajagganepi udaasiinadhaatukova. ^b^.thitassaa^eb^ti catubbidhampi ogha.m taritvaa nibbaanathale .thitassa, pa.tisandhiggaha.navasena vaa sandhaavanassa abhaavena .thitassa ^a^M0.0150^ea^. sekkhaputhujjanaa hi kilesaabhisa"nkhaaraana.m appahiinattaa cutipa.tisandhivasena sa.msaare dhaavanti naama, arahaa pana tadabhaavato .thitoti vuccati. atha vaa dasavidhe khii.naasavasa"nkhaate ariyadhamme .thitassa. ^b^taadino^eb^ti ``pa.tikuule appa.tikuulasa~n~nii viharatii''tiaadinaa (pa.ti0 ma0 3.17) nayena ^a^V0.0135^ea^ vuttaaya pa~ncavidhaaya ariyiddhiyaa a.t.thahi lokadhammehi akampaniyaaya cha.la"ngupekkhaaya ca samannaagatena i.t.thaadiisu ekasadisataasa"nkhaatena taadiibhaavena taadino. ^b^attho natthi jana.m lapetave^eb^ti ``mama bhesajjaadiini karothaa''ti jana.m lapitu.m kathetu.m payojana.m natthi sariire nirapekkhabhaavato. pa.n.dupalaaso viya hi bandhanaa pavutto sayamevaaya.m kaayo bhijjitvaa patatuuti khii.naasavaana.m ajjhaasayo. vutta~nheta.m --
[21] ``naabhika"nkhaami mara.na.m, naabhika"nkhaami jiivita.m.
[22] kaala~nca pa.tika"nkhaami, nibbisa.m bhatako yathaa''ti.. (theragaa0 606).

[03] atha vaa ya.mki~nci nimitta.m dassetvaa ``ki.m ayyassa icchitabba''nti jana.m lapetave paccayehi nimantanavasena lapaapetu.m khii.naasavassa attho natthi taadisassa micchaajiivassa maggeneva samugghaatitattaati attho. iti bhagavaa ``kissaaya.m thero attano roga.m vejjehi atikicchaapetvaa bhagavato aviduure nisiidatii''ti cintentaana.m tassa atikicchaapane kaara.na.m pakaasesi.
[06] pa.thamasuttava.n.nanaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^P0.0168^ea^ ^b^nando^eb^ti tassa naama.m. so hi cakkavattilakkha.nuupetattaa maataapitaro saparijana.m sakala~nca ~naatipariva.t.ta.m nandayanto jaatoti ``nando''ti naama.m labhi. ^b^bhagavato bhaataa^eb^ti bhagavato ekapituputtataaya bhaataa. na hi bhagavato sahodaraa uppajjanti, tena vutta.m ^b^``maatucchaaputto''^eb^ti, cuu.lamaatuputtoti attho. mahaapajaapatigotamiyaa hi so putto. ^b^anabhirato^eb^ti na abhirato. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti ^a^M0.0151^ea^ brahma.m se.t.tha.m uttama.m cariya.m ekaasana.m ekaseyya.m methunavirati.m. ^b^sandhaaretu^eb^nti pa.thamacittato yaavacarimakacitta.m sammaa paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m dhaaretu.m pavattetu.m. dutiyena cettha brahmacariyapadena maggabrahmacariyassaapi sa"ngaho veditabbo. ^b^sikkha.m paccakkhaayaa^eb^ti upasampadakaale bhikkhubhaavena saddhi.m samaadinna.m nibbattetabbabhaavena anu.t.thita.m tividhampi sikkha.m pa.tikkhipitvaa, vissajjetvaati attho. ^b^hiinaayaa^eb^ti gihibhaavaaya. ^b^aavattissaamii^eb^ti nivattissaami.

[03] kasmaa ^a^V0.0136^ea^ panaaya.m evamaarocesiiti? etthaaya.m anupubbikathaa -- bhagavaa pavattavaradhammacakko raajagaha.m gantvaa ve.luvane viharanto ``putta.m me aanetvaa dassethaa''ti suddhodanamahaaraajena pesitesu sahassasahassaparivaaresu dasasu duutesu saha parivaarena arahatta.m pattesu sabbapacchaa gantvaa arahattappattena kaa.ludaayittherena gamanakaala.m ~natvaa maggava.n.nana.m va.n.netvaa jaatibhuumigamanaaya yaacito viisatisahassakhii.naasavaparivutto kapilavatthunagara.m gantvaa ~naatisamaagame pokkharavassa.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa vessantarajaataka.m (jaa0 2.22.1655 aadayo) kathetvaa punadivase pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho ``utti.t.the nappamajjeyyaa''ti (dha0 pa0 168) gaathaaya pitara.m sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaapetvaa nivesana.m gantvaa ``dhamma~ncare''ti (dha0 pa0 169) gaathaaya mahaapajaapati.m sotaapattiphale, raajaana.m sakadaagaamiphale pati.t.thaapesi.

[03] bhattakiccaavasaane ^a^P0.0169^ea^ pana raahulamaatugu.nakatha.m nissaaya candakinnariijaataka.m (jaa0 1.14.18 aadayo) kathetvaa tatiyadivase nandakumaarassa abhisekagehappavesanavivaahama"ngalesu vattamaanesu pi.n.daaya pavisitvaa nandakumaarassa hatthe patta.m datvaa ma"ngala.m vatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamanto kumaarassa hatthato patta.m na ga.nhi. sopi tathaagate gaaravena ``patta.m te, bhante, ga.nhathaa''ti vattu.m naasakkhi. eva.m pana cintesi, ``sopaanasiise patta.m ga.nhissatii''ti, satthaa tasmi.m .thaane na ga.nhi. itaro ``sopaanamuule ga.nhissatii''ti cintesi, satthaa tatthapi na ga.nhi. itaro ``raaja"nga.ne ga.nhissatii''ti cintesi, satthaa tatthapi na ga.nhi. kumaaro nivattitukaamo anicchaaya gacchanto gaaravena ``patta.m ga.nhathaa''ti vattu.m na sakkoti, ``idha ga.nhissati, ettha ga.nhissatii''ti cintento gacchati.

[03] tasmi.m ^a^M0.0152^ea^ kha.ne janapadakalyaa.niyaa aacikkhi.msu, ``ayye bhagavaa, nandaraajaana.m gahetvaa gacchati, tumhehi vinaa karissatii''ti. saa udakabinduuhi paggharantehi a.d.dhullikhitehi kesehi vegena paasaada.m aaruyha siihapa~njaradvaare .thatvaa ``tuva.ta.m kho, ayyaputta, aagaccheyyaasii''ti aaha. ta.m tassaa vacana.m tassa hadaye tiriya.m patitvaa viya .thita.m. satthaapissa hatthato patta.m aggahetvaava ta.m vihaara.m netvaa ``pabbajissasi nandaa''ti aaha. so buddhagaaravena ``na pabbajissaamii''ti avatvaa, ``aama, pabbajissaamii''ti aaha. satthaa tena hi nanda.m pabbaajethaati kapilavatthupura.m gantvaa tatiyadivase ta.m pabbaajesi. sattame divase maataraa ala"nkaritvaa pesita.m ``daayajja.m me, sama.na, dehii''ti vatvaa attanaa saddhi.m aaraamaagata.m raahulakumaara.m pabbaajesi. punekadivasa.m mahaadhammapaalajaataka.m (jaa0 1.10.92 aadayo) kathetvaa raajaana.m anaagaamiphale pati.t.thaapesi.

[03] iti ^a^V0.0137^ea^ bhagavaa mahaapajaapati.m sotaapattiphale, pitara.m tiisu phalesu pati.t.thaapetvaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto punadeva raajagaha.m gantvaa tato anaathapi.n.dikena saavatthi.m aagamanatthaaya gahitapa.ti~n~no ni.t.thite jetavanamahaavihaare tattha gantvaa vaasa.m kappesi. eva.m satthari jetavane viharante aayasmaa nando attano ^a^P0.0170^ea^ anicchaaya pabbajito kaamesu anaadiinavadassaavii janapadakalyaa.niyaa vuttavacanamanussaranto ukka.n.thito hutvaa bhikkhuuna.m attano anabhirati.m aarocesi. tena vutta.m ^b^``tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa nando...pe0... hiinaayaavattissaamii''^eb^ti.

[03] kasmaa pana na.m bhagavaa eva.m pabbaajesiiti? ``puretarameva aadiinava.m dassetvaa kaamehi na.m vivecetu.m na sakkaa, pabbaajetvaa pana upaayena tato vivecetvaa uparivisesa.m nibbattessaamii''ti veneyyadamanakusalo satthaa eva.m na.m pa.thama.m pabbaajesi.

[03] ^b^saakiyaanii^eb^ti sakyaraajadhiitaa. ^b^janapadakalyaa.nii^eb^ti janapadamhi kalyaa.nii ruupena uttamaa chasariiradosarahitaa, pa~ncakalyaa.nasamannaagataa. saa hi yasmaa naatidiighaa naatirassaa naatikisaa naatithuulaa naatikaa.likaa naccodaataa atikkantaa maanusakava.n.na.m appattaa dibbava.n.na.m, tasmaa chasariiradosarahitaa. chavikalyaa.na.m ma.msakalyaa.na.m nakhakalyaa.na.m a.t.thikalyaa.na.m vayakalyaa.nanti imehi pa~ncahi kalyaa.nehi samannaagataa.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0153^ea^ attano sariirobhaasena dasadvaadasahatthe .thaane aaloka.m karoti, piya"ngusamaa vaa suva.n.nasamaa vaa hoti, ayamassaa ^b^chavikalyaa.nataa^eb^. cattaaro panassaa hatthapaadaa mukhapariyosaana~nca laakhaarasaparikammakata.m viya rattapavaa.larattakambalena sadisa.m hoti, ayamassaa ^b^ma.msakalyaa.nataa^eb^. viisati nakhapattaani ma.msato amutta.t.thaane laakhaarasaparikitaani viya mutta.t.thaane khiiradhaaraasadisaani honti, ayamassaa ^b^nakhakalyaa.nataa^eb^. dvatti.msadantaa suphusitaa parisuddhapavaa.lapantisadisaa vajirapantii viya khaayanti, ayamassaa ^b^a.t.thikalyaa.nataa^eb^. viisativassasatikaapi samaanaa so.lasavassuddesikaa viya hoti nippalitaa, ayamassaa ^b^vayakalyaa.nataa^eb^. sundarii ca hoti evaruupagu.nasamannaagataa, tena vutta.m ^b^``janapadakalyaa.nii''^eb^ti.
